string.value: Daily Quest

string.name: name
string.value: The Name

string.name: info
string.value: You need to name your farm!

string.name: todo
string.value: Name Your Farm

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi there! I'm Clara.\nAre you my new assistant? I'll be expecting my mochachino latte at 11:07 every morning. Do not wake me up a moment before that or...

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, are you the farm owner? Oh my, you're much more... is shabby a mean word? I hope you'll at least come up with a new name for the place.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't make it too... hillbilly-ish. This farm is very chic and important, like me. Just come up with something around six letters long.

string.name: msg
string.value: I suppose I can stand to work on a farm with a name like something out of my grandmother's country outhouse. As long as you promise to put up some deocrations...

string.name: name
string.value: Humble Beginnings

string.name: info
string.value: Welcome to Monster Life!

string.name: todo
string.value: Talk to Clara

string.name: msg
string.value: Your farm is ready to go!

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess you're expecting me to tell you what to do around here. Typical.\nFollow me, and try not to fall in love.

string.name: msg
string.value: This place is pretty pathetic right now. Your house doesn't even have a staircase waterfall!\nI suppose everybody starts somewhere...

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe things will look better with a building. Here, I've been storing this one in my wardrobe warehouse. I'll allow you to use it.

string.name: msg
string.value: You know, instead of us having conversations, why don't I just give you little missions to complete? That way I can feel powerful and you have to do things for me. It's win-win, really.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your first mission: talk to me. A lot. More. Now tell me how good this outfit looks. Okay, that's good.

string.name: msg
string.value: Here is the house I promised you. This type of building is all the rage in Henesys, which I suppose is good if you enjoy being a commoner.

string.name: msg
string.value: Press the Decorate Farm button on the bottom left. You'll need to select the first tab and find that house to place it.

string.name: name
string.value: Farm Hero

string.name: info
string.value: Now put it on your farm, and you'll have a little reminder of my generosity every time you look at it.

string.name: todo
string.value: Build the Henesys Homestead

string.name: msg
string.value: I thought you were going to build that Henesys Homestead I gave you... It was to be my monument!

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, I'll give you one more chance before I set my hair on fire. Go to Decorate Farm on the bottom left and select the Henesys Homestead from the first tab.

string.name: msg
string.value: Click on the house, then select a place on your farm to build.

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, I know it won't be as beautiful as if I were to do it, but go ahead.

string.name: msg
string.value: Just think, in a few months, you'll look back at that rickety little shack and think, 'why didn't I go into high finance trading?'

string.name: msg
string.value: Luckily, even ugly buildings bring in the Waru, which is money here.

string.name: msg
string.value: Make sure to collect all the Warus you can. The conversion rate is terrible, but it's very exclusive.

string.name: name
string.value: Waru, Waru, Won't You?

string.name: info
string.value: And, if you're the type that likes to think about numbers or building safety, you can open the information window on any building to see more about it.

string.name: todo
string.value: Harvest Waru from Buildings

string.name: msg
string.value: Remember when I told you that you could harvest Waru from buildings?\nGood, because I could use an advance on my salary...

string.name: msg
string.value: Buildings generate a new batch of Warus every 10 minutes, and once their bank is full, they won't generate any more until you clear it out.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, you'll figure it out, can you just try getting Warus from the house?

string.name: msg
string.value: When you see the alert icon over the building, it's ready to collect. Collect them on a regular basis, and I'll finally be able to afford that diamond-studded shaving kit I've been eying.

string.name: msg
string.value: Click on the building, open the information window, then hit Harvest.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes! Now the Russian mob won't come and...\nI mean, keep collecting that Waru!

string.name: msg
string.value: You're quite the instruction follower, aren't you? I'll let you keep a little bit of that money for being so good at listening to me.

string.name: name
string.value: Green with Compliance

string.name: info
string.value: Let's see if you really do everything I say. Buy me a Green Mushroom Hut.

string.name: todo
string.value: Build a Green Mushroom Hut

string.name: msg
string.value: I think you need some pointers on shopping.\nIt's not that you're doing a BAD job, it's just that I do it better than anyone.

string.name: msg
string.value: First, click on that Shop button and find the big Green Mushroom, those are SO in-style right now.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now, buy it! Don't worry about money, you should have enough and we're splurging today.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now put it on your farm. It'll make that Henesys Homestead look better by proxy.

string.name: msg
string.value: That shopping lesson is going to cost you, especially now that you're going to be making more money.

string.name: name
string.value: Mystical Monster Boxes

string.name: info
string.value: Open Up Some Monster Boxes.

string.name: todo
string.value: Receive Monster Box

string.name: msg
string.value: Your farm looks way less awful now, but don't you want some adorable little monsters? That's sort of like, most of the point.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to tell you a little story now, about the birdloks and the beezors, which are basically just birds and bees, but terrifying. Anyway, both of them come out of Monster Boxes, just like every other monster on the farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: That mega-hunk, Dr. Jules, sent over a Monster Box for you to try out. He's so dreamy, but he spends all of his time studying Monsters instead of those 'How to Love Your Clara' books I sent him.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now, you never know what kind of monster you'll find inside a box. Sometimes they're sweet, sometimes they're just full of spiders. It's a thrilling mystery.

string.name: msg
string.value: Why don't you open the box Julesy sent over and see what's inside? I hope it doesn't spit acid like the last one he sent me.

string.name: name
string.value: Lookin' for Love

string.name: info
string.value: Sadly, monsters need attention, which always manages to detract from me, but you'll need to right-click on them to Nurture their feelings.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: The monsters on your farm are a lot like me... they need constant approval and a steady diet of high-end merchandise to stay alive.

string.name: msg
string.value: I suppose they really just need the attention.\nMaybe I'd better teach you how to give it to them.

string.name: msg
string.value: If you haven't already opened that Monster Box, you'll need to do it now. Go to Decorate Farm, then go to the Gift Boxes on the second tab.

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's see what you get. I hope it knows how to make a decent caprese salad.

string.name: msg
string.value: Once you have a monster, right-click on it and press the Nurture button to tell it how proud you are to be picking up its poops.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your farm does best when your monsters are happy, so be liberal with your compliments. You could start now by telling me what kind of diamonds my eyes remind you of. I like to think they're princess cut.

string.name: msg
string.value: That monster looks happy. I'm trying not to crush it in a jealous rage.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'd better go see Dr. Jules. Don't stop working on your farm, all right?

string.name: name
string.value: Orange You Gonna Buy That?

string.name: info
string.value: It's about time for you to build an Orange Mushroom House. Get to it, will you?

string.name: todo
string.value: Build an Orange Mushroom House

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi! You that new farmer?

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm Paolo, and this here's my dog-slash-personal-DJ-chef, Kibbles.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I am a dog!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Ha ha, Kibbles, you are smarter than people.\nAnyway, where's Clara at? She was supposed to come help me clean the jellyfish out of my refrigerator. You would not believe how much they like peanut butter.

string.name: msg
string.value: Have you learned to make buildings yet? I feel like your farm could use an Orange Mushroom House to make it more like the greasy diner in my night-terrors.

string.name: msg
string.value: You've got enough scratch to buy that now. Go to the shop and tear it up!

string.name: msg
string.value: I would eat one of those if it was not so offensive to the mushroom tourists that are staying in my guest house.

string.name: name
string.value: Forest of Excitement

string.name: info
string.value: Now I want you to add some greenery to your farm. I want it to be like a magical forest, except on a farm!

string.name: todo
string.value: Plant a Lil' Pine Tree

string.name: msg
string.value: You need to breathe some exuberance into this dull farm, like I did with that sad goldfish I found in my pocket.

string.name: msg
string.value: What I mean is you have to decorate! You can do simple stuff, like some 18th century Mongolian Vajrayana paintings or a few flowers from the convenience store.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I will pee on all of those things!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, you do not know how to decorate.

string.name: msg
string.value: The first step is to... I actually do not know anything about this, but I bet it's just like building houses. Now build me a Lil' Pine Tree.

string.name: msg
string.value: Is that what a pine tree looks like? Maybe I was thinking of a gas station.

string.name: msg
string.value: This majestic tree is making me feel majestic. I bet it will make your monsters feel majestic too, and that means your farm will do better. Trust me. Farming is all about majesty.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh! It's time for Kibbles to go to his afternoon improv classes. You're gonna be in a moderately successful romantic comedy one day, aren't you boy?

string.name: info
string.value: Your monsters need paths or they'll get lost!

string.name: todo
string.value: Make Paths

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, my name's Aya. I'm here for my community service. You the boss?

string.name: msg
string.value: What's with the slack jaw? You think fairies can't work on a farm? Huh?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Sorry, my probation officer says I've got a lip on me... Hey, what's the deal with your front lawn? It's kind of a dump.

string.name: msg
string.value: You should put up some paths out there... Or you could just stick an old car on some cinder blocks if you want to keep up the whole 'I don't care' look you've got going.

string.name: msg
string.value: Two minutes on the job and I'm already in charge... hit the Decorate Farm section and select one of the Paths from your options.

string.name: msg
string.value: You don't have to put down any Paths, but they'll make the place look at a lot less horrible.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, you've got this, right? Can you just write an hour down on my time card? I gotta go meet a buddy behind the convenience store. Oh, and I guess you can have some of this money I was supposed to bring you to buy stuff.

string.name: name
string.value: Forest of Excitement 2

string.name: info
string.value: That one tree you've got is looking pretty sad. You should plant two more so it's not lonely.

string.name: todo
string.value: Plant a Lil' Pine Tree

string.name: msg
string.value: Phew, I hope I didn't keep you waiting. Oh wait, reverse that.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm glad I missed Paolo. Sometimes he just... stares at me. Don't get me wrong, I love the attention, but I really think he's trying to figure out if he could take me in a fight.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did he make you plant that tree? I bet he thought it was going to be a gas station again.

string.name: msg
string.value: Why did you only plant one? Aren't you afraid that all your neighbors will see and realize how unimportant you are? You need to plant more.

string.name: msg
string.value: Having one Lil' Pine Tree is like telling the world you're willing to settle for honorary mention. Buy two more and plant them before anybody notices.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now that I see the two of them together, I feel like they're taking the focus off of me.

string.name: msg
string.value: You know that I, and your monsters, need a nice environment to thrive, right? You need to plan ahead or you're going to run into layout problems, and any discomfort I experience will be taken out of your safe.

string.name: name
string.value: Combo Number 1

string.name: info
string.value: Use the menu to move to the Study, or use the Mirror to find monsters you'd like to combine. Just right-click, then hit Combine. You can also talk to me to visit a random farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Did Bosco send you? I'll have his money, I just need a little more...

string.name: msg
string.value: You're... not here to hit me in the knees, are you? I'm Dr. Julian Von Jules, professional monster biologist and amateur mixologist to the stars.

string.name: msg
string.value: Come on, let's get this monster party going! You'll never get anywhere in farming if you don't start combining.

string.name: msg
string.value: I blame the Black Mage for all the violent monsters we've been seeing. I also blame him for the botched surgery that got my medical license revoked.

string.name: msg
string.value: Keep your farm neat and tidy, like my accountant keeps that one set of books I let the government see. Both of those situations pay off in the end.

string.name: msg
string.value: Monsters from the same farm should never be combined, it's terrible for their self-esteem.

string.name: msg
string.value: You'll need to wait until at least level 3 before you can combine new monsters too.

string.name: msg
string.value: Finally, don't let your monsters get too corrupted by the outside world, or they won't be able to combine. You don't want them turning all jaded and mopey like a bunch of liberal arts majors.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now, use the Mirror in my Study to visit a random farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: When you get there, first check the house for any undercover detectives. Then, leave one of my business cards on the counter, in case they need a mixologist for a party. THEN, right-click on a monster and select Combine.

string.name: msg
string.value: I usually don't let strangers watch the monster combining process, but you look like the kind of person I can blackmail if I need to. Try combining one of your monsters with someone else's.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look at those monsters combine. It's almost... OH MY GOODNESS is that what it looks like?! I think I'm going to barf!

string.name: msg
string.value: Do you at least like your new monster? Personally, I can't stand the things. They all just want food and medical attention.

string.name: msg
string.value: One little tip, really let your monsters know which ones are your favorites. A little competition is always good, and your love can be a powerful motivator.

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's see, I told you about withholding love, breaking into farm-houses... Darnit, I was supposed to leave an hour ago, but there are a few more things.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now, usually your monster combinations will spit out something similar, but every once in a while you'll get a real genetic freak.

string.name: msg
string.value: The same thing happens with high-grade or high-level monsters. They sometimes create a monster better than them.

string.name: msg
string.value: All this monster combining talk is really starting to put me to sleep. What will it take for you to leave me alone for a while?

string.name: name
string.value: Triple Mushroom Farm

string.name: info
string.value: Once you build Red Mushroom Manor, you'll have all the mushroom houses. Then you can make a stew!

string.name: todo
string.value: Build Red Mushroom Manor

string.name: msg
string.value: I heard Jules gave you a lesson for free. You're so lucky... Can you tell that I'm holding back a scream right now?

string.name: msg
string.value: The only cure for my homicidal rage is a shiny new thing. You should build Red Mushroom Manor.

string.name: msg
string.value: Buy me Red Mushroom Manor, and I'll stop powdering your pillows with borax.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look how beautiful it is! Almost as rosy as my cheeks!

string.name: name
string.value: Hungry Hot

string.name: info
string.value: It's hot. Time for Big Pine Trees and more shade!

string.name: todo
string.value: Plant a Big Pine Tree

string.name: msg
string.value: Hungry Hot

string.name: msg
string.value: Why is your farm always so hot? Are we on the face of the sun?

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, I don't care if I'm breaking a court order. I can't work in these conditions. My wings are going to curl up and light on fire.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to raid your refrigerator, and I ain't coming back outside until you plant some bigger trees.

string.name: msg
string.value: You're gonna need to go to the grocery store...

string.name: msg
string.value: It's still hot though... and I think that's your fault.

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Inspector

string.name: info
string.value: Go to another farm and play with some monsters, because your friends are probably being neglectful.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Was Aya throwing a fit about the heat? Just like her to complain about cleansing her perfect pores while I suffer from the increased pollen count...

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's talk more about your farm before I pull all my fingernails off in a rage.

string.name: msg
string.value: You've been to other farms by now, right? You know, if you waste some of your precious time playing with monsters on other farms, people will think you're a good person.

string.name: msg
string.value: That way they'll owe you favors and have to do things for you.

string.name: msg
string.value: I think you might even get some benefits from the monsters, but mostly I do it for the popularity. Dr. Jules really likes generous women...

string.name: msg
string.value: Speaking of which, would you go over to Jules's study, visit another farm, and play with monsters in front of him? It'll really get me some brownie points.

string.name: msg
string.value: Right-click on other monsters and select Play. While you're doing that, I'm going to fake a neck injury and get him to look at it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Good work manipulating your friends! Now they'll feel obligated to come play with your mangy monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: Even the most casual encounter can lead to a good friendship.

string.name: msg
string.value: If other people visit your farm, you should go to theirs and leave them a thank-you note. One-upsmanship is an important skill on the farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: Speaking of which, you can't combine or play with more than one monster in each category each day.

string.name: msg
string.value: You'll really have to plan to make sure you get them all, and the competition for your love should make you feel wonderful about yourself.

string.name: name
string.value: Hey There, Good Lookin'

string.name: info
string.value: The appearance of your farm affects your monsters. Get your Aesthetic Points to 100.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get 100 Aesthetic Points

string.name: msg
string.value: I think we need to have a talk about your farm and the face you're showing the world...

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you know there is a system for measuring how beautiful things are? They're called Aesthetic Points and they may be THE most important invention of the 21st century.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look at that green clover up there, next to those other, less important things.

string.name: msg
string.value: That number tells you how beautiful, and therefore how worthwhile of a person you are. Or your farm, I mean. Whatever.

string.name: msg
string.value: Every decoration and building you have adds to that number, and it will go down if you take any of them away. So don't ever do that. Ever.

string.name: msg
string.value: Decorative items add a lot more points than buildings, even if they don't generate any money.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want to see if you can get your Aesthetic Points up to 100. Think how much everyone will love me if I'm seen on a beautiful farm. This is my chance to be a star!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, I guess you get some buff things too. You can hover over the clover to see them, or you could just sit there and think about how talented I am.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to take so many pictures of myself here!

string.name: msg
string.value: You really have to keep increasing your Aesthetic Points. Never settle for being pretty when you could be gorgeous. The rewards just get better and better, trust me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Keep decorating your farm and we can both enjoy the benefits.

string.name: name
string.value: Picture Perfect

string.name: info
string.value: You can register your profile image by clicking Profile on the left. Give it a go!

string.name: todo
string.value: Select a Profile Picture

string.name: msg
string.value: Now that your confidence is up, you should add a picture to your profile.

string.name: msg
string.value: This could be your chance to share your face with someone important... like me!

string.name: msg
string.value: It's very easy. I change mine three times a day! Just click Profile on the upper left and select your best snapshot.

string.name: msg
string.value: Add something that will impress everyone, like something on a water ski, or maybe something with a D-list celebrity that's less attractive than you are.

string.name: msg
string.value: Just don't put up anything naughty or mean. I'm legally obligated to tell you that after the whole anti-porpoise movement I started.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll come back when you're done! This is personal business.

string.name: name
string.value: Relocation Revolution

string.name: info
string.value: You can move your buildings around with the Relocate button. A little change can keep things fresh!

string.name: todo
string.value: Learn How to Relocate Buildings

string.name: msg
string.value: It's good to know how to move things around. That way, you can confuse the paparazzi.

string.name: msg
string.value: To rearrange your buildings, move to the Decorate Farm tab and click Relocate.

string.name: msg
string.value: You'll see a grid of lines to help you line things up nicely.

string.name: msg
string.value: Click on any building to pick it up, then just move it around, rotate it, whatever makes it look best.

string.name: msg
string.value: Any Paths you try to relocate will be erased. That way you can put down new ones!

string.name: msg
string.value: You can relocate things any time, so rethink your designs on a regular basis. You have to stay on the cutting edge of farm trends.

string.name: msg
string.value: If you cancel out of a relocation, the building will go back to your inventory. Pretty useful, huh?

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Barn

string.name: info
string.value: When your farm gets full, you can store monsters in the Monster Barn.

string.name: todo
string.value: Receive Monster Barn

string.name: msg
string.value: Your farm is looking a little less cringe-inducing.

string.name: msg
string.value: What are you doing with all your excess monsters? I usually just throw mine in the garbage cans at the supermarket.

string.name: msg
string.value: I've heard some people use a Monster Barn to store extra monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: I suppose a Monster Barn would be pretty useful, but it has a lot of rules.

string.name: msg
string.value: For one, any monsters in storage don't give you any potential bonuses.

string.name: msg
string.value: Also, their combination and potential time limits still apply, even when they're stored away.

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess it's better than just letting them run into the woods like I did with that rabid hypnobadger.

string.name: msg
string.value: You can have this Monster Barn. I'll just put it in your things... If your watch goes missing while I'm in there, it wasn't me.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 2

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 2! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey bozo, what am I supposed to do here?

string.name: msg
string.value: What, you never seen a fairy before? Well get used to it. The name's Aya.

string.name: msg
string.value: Here's the deal. I'm working your farm, but I got rules...

string.name: msg
string.value: First up, : no ordering me around, no talking smack about fairies, no comments on my cute little wings or my loud voice.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, and I brought you this stupid present for reaching level 2. There's like a monster or something in there. I don't know, I'm going on break.

string.name: msg
string.value: I gotta go.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now that you're Level 2, you can buy an Orange Mushroom House and Lil' Pine Trees.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 3

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 3! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, did you level up again? Sheesh.

string.name: msg
string.value: You hit level 3, you know what you're doing now...

string.name: msg
string.value: You can build yourself a Red Mushroom Manner, a Sturdy Straw House, a Pine Tree, even one of those Orange Mini Mushrooms...

string.name: msg
string.value: You can even keep three monsters now. You're a pro, right?

string.name: msg
string.value: I brought you this money too because you're soooo greeeat... Must be nice.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 4

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 4! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi! It's me! Didn't you miss me? Huh?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, wow, you're Level 4 already! Good job, really, that's just... wow.

string.name: msg
string.value: I bet your farms, going to get all kinds of golly-gee buildings and decorations!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, and more precious little smushy-faced monsters. Hooray and joy!

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, I even brought you a gift, because I'm so... what do people feel? I don't know, proud?

string.name: msg
string.value: Psst... if anybody asks, I was here last night and I'm terrified of crowbars. Okay, right? Buddy? Pal? We're cool, right?

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 7

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 7! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, now that you're level 7, you can finally upgrade that shack you live in!

string.name: msg
string.value: You can get the upgrade from the shop. Maybe you could get a flat screen and a fairy-sized hammock while you're at it?

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, I don't usually like being nice to you, but I'll help you out on this one since it helps me too. Here's some money.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 32

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 32! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Level 32, huh? You think you're big now? Huh, boss?! HUH?! You're not so big...

string.name: msg
string.value: I mean, I guess you're bigger than me, but...

string.name: msg
string.value: Whatever! I brought you a gift. Don't think that means I like you!

string.name: msg
string.value: I hope the monster in there takes over your house, and then you'll have to come see me, and you'll be like, 'Oh, Aya, please stop the monster from using my nice sheets!' But I won't. I won't do it.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 34

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 34! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Level 34 rhymes with hardcore. I think I'll use that for my new rap persona, MC Fairy Dust!

string.name: msg
string.value: Passion, fashion, your face needs a bashin'... I float up in the club and all these suckas eat my rations... Record contract, here I come!

string.name: msg
string.value: That performance was worth at least 200,000 Warus. So here's what's going to happen. I brought 400,000 Warus for you, but I'm going to keep half.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll be back tomorrow for another show. Don't lose that money.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 36

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 36! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: So, about that whole rap star plan I had going...

string.name: msg
string.value: Now that you're level 36, I was thinking maybe you could call some people for me, maybe put in a good word with the rap moguls?

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, I even brought you a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: It's a good one too! I took it out of my dad's garage. It's the Secret Garden!

string.name: msg
string.value: Since I'm being so nice, how about you maybe call all of your fancy producer friends with their shiny cars, and tell them you have the next big sensation eating sandwiches in your kitchen. Also, I'm going to make a sandwich.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 38

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 38! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: You gotta hide me! I don't care if it's your Level 38 celebration or not!

string.name: msg
string.value: This guy named Big Peezy sent me a fancy monster box, and now he wants me to actually cut an album with him! I can't do that! I'm not a rapper!

string.name: msg
string.value: I didn't think you actually HAD any producer friends! Why didn't you tell me?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ah, geez, there's a paparazzo in your bushes. I gotta hide!

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 39

string.name: info
string.value: You hit level 39! Time for a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: I've decided to embrace the whole rising star thing. I mean, I can rap, right? How hard could it be?

string.name: msg
string.value: All I have to do is buy a big fur coat, talk smack about some reality tv star online, maybe hire a couple of dancers... boom, superstar.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'd also better give out some elaborate gifts I can't afford... like this super-slick monster box.

string.name: msg
string.value: I got special monsters like I got phat beats! I'll come back when you're 40 and we'll get some phat eats! Yeah... I got this.

string.name: name
string.value: The Leveling Fairy: 40

string.name: info
string.value: You're a Master Farmer!

string.name: msg
string.value: So, you're 40. I guess that means my community service is officially over.

string.name: msg
string.value: It's about time!

string.name: msg
string.value: I mean, it's not like I hate it here. This isn't the worst trash heap a hip-hop megastar like myself could be chilling in. It ain't a solid gold jaccuzzi or anything, but...

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, I think you need one last thing to spruce your swagger.

string.name: msg
string.value: You gotta get straight Luminous up in this piece!

string.name: msg
string.value: He's tiny, angry, and full of all kinds of emotions. Just like me. He's even got a slick cane he carries around.

string.name: msg
string.value: You get Luminous here, and I'll forget all about those times I called you a pathetic dirt-shuffler behind your back.

string.name: name
string.value: Monsterer Achieved

string.name: info
string.value: You completed 20 Achievements! Here's your gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: You earned 20 achievements. That's pretty achievable.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't you want something to celebrate? You should.

string.name: msg
string.value: Not all gifts are completely useless, you know?

string.name: msg
string.value: Try not to get eaten by anything too horrible out there!

string.name: info
string.value: You earned 45 achievements! You should get more stuff.

string.name: msg
string.value: You earned 45 achievements. How did you achieve so much?

string.name: msg
string.value: I kept looking for something else to give.

string.name: msg
string.value: I found few of these in the storage.

string.name: msg
string.value: I forgot why I even got them in the first place.

string.name: msg
string.value: Eh, this should be all right.

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Overlord

string.name: info
string.value: Wow, you completed 70 achievements! That's definitely worth me caring.

string.name: msg
string.value: You earned 70 achievements. You're such an overachiever.

string.name: msg
string.value: This is your reward.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'd rather just give you one at a time. That's easier for me.

string.name: name
string.value: All Achievements Complete

string.name: info
string.value: You finished all the achievements! You'll have to find something new to validate your existence.

string.name: msg
string.value: You completed 101 achievements. What's left to achieve?

string.name: msg
string.value: This is special just for you.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll be seeing you around.

string.name: name
string.value: We Meet Again

string.name: info
string.value: You were reunited with monsters you released? Was there a lot of weeping?

string.name: msg
string.value: You were reunited with monsters you released? Did any of them try to cut you?

string.name: msg
string.value: I need to find something to remember the occasion...

string.name: msg
string.value: Here, take this. It's to remember the occasion.

string.name: info
string.value: I know you're rich now, but you should save up for my birthday.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wow, you're really rich.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll give you a little something to remember the occasion.

string.name: msg
string.value: You should remember this moment, especially when you inevitably hit the poor house.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe I've said too much. Anyway, congratulations.

string.name: name
string.value: Quest Keeper

string.name: info
string.value: You finished all the story quests! Aren't we fun?

string.name: msg
string.value: You finished all the story quests! Why did you do that?!

string.name: msg
string.value: It must've been a long trip. Judging by the dirt, I mean.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll give you something to remember the occasion.

string.name: name
string.value: Master Pen Pal

string.name: info
string.value: You wrote in a lot of Guest Books. Was it all like, 'stay cool!'?

string.name: msg
string.value: You wrote in a lot of Guest Books. Should that weird me out?

string.name: msg
string.value: You sure are showing a lot of interest in your neighbors... what do you have to hide?

string.name: msg
string.value: Here's your gift.

string.name: name
string.value: Wolf-Proof Straw House

string.name: info
string.value: Build a Sturdy Straw House for your farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Build a Sturdy Straw House

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, do stuff for me.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want you to build a me something cool. Some place I can take naps during the day.

string.name: msg
string.value: Buy me a Sturdy Straw House! I want it!

string.name: msg
string.value: Why aren't you in the shop yet?

string.name: msg
string.value: Eh, I guess this looks pretty sturdy. I'm gonna go get some chips and pierce my nose.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya left.

string.name: info
string.value: Buy me a White Cube! For reasons!

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy a White Cube

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, I want to see what you'll do if I ask you.

string.name: msg
string.value: Go buy a White Cube from the shop and put it out.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't give me that dopey look, just go buy it!

string.name: msg
string.value: Huh, that cube sure is white.

string.name: msg
string.value: All right, I'm outties!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya tries to rush out the door.

string.name: msg
string.value: Where are you going? You're supposed to go in for a check-up with Dr. Jules.

string.name: msg
string.value: You don't own me! It's my body, I do what I want!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: msg
string.value: What a brat. She's so selfish.

string.name: msg
string.value: She didn't talk about me once.

string.name: msg
string.value: Here, I brought you this thing because it was blocking the path between me and my mirror.

string.name: name
string.value: Food for Thought

string.name: info
string.value: I want to cook for Dr. Jules, but your fruit is terrible. Go play with Plants on other farms 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: What is a pie, exactly?

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules hasn't been eating well, and my spiritualist told me pies made people happy.

string.name: msg
string.value: I think it requires fruit, but everything on this farm tastes like old boiled sand. Maybe you could go to another farm and play with the Plants there?

string.name: msg
string.value: Wonderful! Now make me a pie!

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara starts cooking, but gets bored, so you take over. The hours roll by...

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you done yet? Julesy will be hungry!

string.name: msg
string.value: At Dr. Jules's house...

string.name: msg
string.value: He's not home. Break in and put it on his counter.

string.name: msg
string.value: Also, write him a love note from me. Extra steamy!

string.name: msg
string.value: Some time later...

string.name: msg
string.value: This is *nom* easily *nom* the worst pie *nom* I've ever eaten *nom* in its entirety.

string.name: msg
string.value: I bet we are going to get married TOMORROW.

string.name: name
string.value: Ask Me No Questions

string.name: info
string.value: I would like you to purchase an Orange Mini Mushroom and I do not want you to ask me why.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy an Orange Mini Mushroom from the Shop

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (The hat-man is my friend.)

string.name: msg
string.value: I need one of those Orange Mini Mushrooms and they won't let me back in the Shop after I aired that attack ad about their prices.

string.name: msg
string.value: Just get me one, okay?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you get it?! I still can't tell you why.

string.name: msg
string.value: Stop trying to pry into my personal business and give the me thing you spent your money on!

string.name: msg
string.value: Later, at Clara's place...

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh. Hi.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi. You're back. Why didn't you say hello the first time?

string.name: msg
string.value: What's wrong?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (My human smells like fear and saltines.)

string.name: msg
string.value: I have a gift from my heart!

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo drops his gift on the ground and runs away.

string.name: msg
string.value: Who put a fungus in my room?! If this is another death threat, I'm going to set up so many booby traps.

string.name: msg
string.value: I think Clara liked it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (The humans are barking! I will bark too!)

string.name: name
string.value: Different Approach

string.name: info
string.value: I have some new theories to test out. Could you go to to other farms and combine monsters three times for me?

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Isn't the weather lovely today?

string.name: msg
string.value: The answer is NO! That's just what they WANT you to think. But I'm testing a new pill that will make you see the REAL weather.

string.name: msg
string.value: Four-eyes wants me to work! This is ridiculous.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, ridiculous! Just like the fake weather. Now go combine monsters 3 times, and I'll test this out on the fairy.

string.name: msg
string.value: This is guaranteed to be the worst day of work ever.

string.name: msg
string.value: You can't mix those two! You'll turn into a goat!

string.name: msg
string.value: You don't know me, man! Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't worry, I put a tracking chip in her earlier.

string.name: msg
string.value: It looks like my weather revealer isn't going to work, so we'll just have to go on living a big fat lie.

string.name: name
string.value: A Solid Plan

string.name: info
string.value: I need to show Jules up. He thinks he's so smart with his medical degrees and his years of education and his being smart. I know stuff too! I know I'm supposed to nurture 5 monsters and I'm gonna make you do it!

string.name: msg
string.value: Julesy-poo, what do you think with that big brain of yours?

string.name: msg
string.value: I JUST started the leeching regimen, Clara. Give it time.

string.name: msg
string.value: They're attached at the hip! And not in the cool, conjoined twin way.

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo watches Clara and Jules from a distance...

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo, this is technically stalking.

string.name: msg
string.value: This isn't stalking! I'm just following her without her knowing it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Whatever, Romeo. I was going to give you some advice.

string.name: msg
string.value: Huh? What is it?

string.name: msg
string.value: You want to outdo the Captain Cranium?

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, very much so, I would like to do that.

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara's into that doofus for some reason. Must be the big old noggin. You need to out-brain him.

string.name: msg
string.value: It ain't gonna be easy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, I can't stand when your face is all... sad. I'll teach you not to be such an idiot, okay? I'll be your little love fairy.

string.name: msg
string.value: For starters, let's go take care of five monsters so we don't have to look at these two getting all smoochy.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to go eat his glasses to assert my dominance!

string.name: msg
string.value: No! That's step 15. You're only on step 4.

string.name: msg
string.value: When will this end?!

string.name: name
string.value: Training for Love

string.name: info
string.value: Next up: visit other farms and play with monsters 10 times! Move, move!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: I need a break from this love expert thing. Go play with some monsters. Like 10 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing a thing!

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah, yeah, good job.

string.name: msg
string.value: Why is there water leaking from my forehead?

string.name: name
string.value: Experienced Gentleman

string.name: info
string.value: Okay, okay, you want to be a stud muffin? Go combine monsters 5 times on other farms.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe you need to see how monsters get along. Go combine like... 5 monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: Then I will be the master of all love and time and swords?

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah, sure. Great. Good work.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm the best! I'm amazing!

string.name: msg
string.value: Class dismissed or whatever.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm gonna impress this awful lady I love for no reason!

string.name: msg
string.value: Later, near Jules's house...

string.name: msg
string.value: ...And THAT's why you never make popcorn AFTER you microwave a gerbil.

string.name: msg
string.value: Fascinating! I've been doing it wrong for years. All those paper towels, wasted!

string.name: msg
string.value: I didn't know you dabbled in monsterology, Paulo!

string.name: msg
string.value: (She looks impressed!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules, you should ask Paolo more about his studies and how attractive they make him.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ha ha. Okay.

string.name: msg
string.value: (I am still a huge failure!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Why are you looking at me like that?

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Kid

string.name: info
string.value: Having a pretty farm helps you make friends. Get 200 Aesthetic Points.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get 200 Aesthetic Points

string.name: msg
string.value: You know what gals love? Friends. Especially friends who don't mind when you crash on their couch for a few months because I got into a fight with my parents again.

string.name: msg
string.value: Speaking of which, can I crash on your couch for a few months?

string.name: msg
string.value: Actually, if you want any girls to come over here, you need to pretty it up some. I only stay in places that have at least 200 Aesthetic Points.

string.name: msg
string.value: I am unaware of this concept.

string.name: msg
string.value: You just need to build stuff. Like buildings and decorations. They'll up your score.

string.name: msg
string.value: You seem less... reprehensible.

string.name: msg
string.value: Success! I expect breakfast at 2:37pm on the dot.

string.name: msg
string.value: PEACE OUT!

string.name: msg
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: name
string.value: One Sick Fairy

string.name: info
string.value: Aya's acting sick. It's annoying. I bet some Mushroom medicine would shut her up. Play with them 5 times to get enough ingredients.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with a Mushroom

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya is being such a drama fairy.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want to get some medicine for her...

string.name: msg
string.value: (That'll show her.)

string.name: msg
string.value: I just need a few ingredients. Could you play with Mushrooms in other farms 5 times? I'll collect the spores.

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you! All these ingredients have potent medicinal properties. Hehehe... hahah... MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

string.name: name
string.value: One Sick Fairy: The Reckoning

string.name: info
string.value: Let's move on to some other ingredients. Please play with Reptiles on other farms 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with a Reptile

string.name: msg
string.value: I got the mushroom medicine together, but it's missing something... How about you try the same thing but with Reptiles?

string.name: msg
string.value: Just play with them and I'll pick up the... droppings.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now I can just mix these up and... hehehe...

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: All set. Prepare for a taste of mushroom-lizard-humble pie, fairy!

string.name: msg
string.value: (I wonder if her wings will fall off...)

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you! I'll make sure Aya knows how much you helped!

string.name: name
string.value: Friend Me Like a Hurricane

string.name: info
string.value: Visit other farms and play with their monsters 10 times. Gee golly, it's so nice to have friends!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Friendships take lots of hard work and snuggles! Let's all have a good-gosh-giffy of a time!

string.name: msg
string.value: Go play with your friends' monsters and spread the love!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ten times!

string.name: msg
string.value: This has to be some kind of weird power play... right?

string.name: msg
string.value: Magnificent! Value your friends.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, I've got some very exclusive juice for you. You'll love it. It's all the rage with street people.

string.name: msg
string.value: (Her little toes are going to curl up... Hehehe!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Why gosh, it'd be rude of me to refuse such a friendly gesture, Clara-beara!

string.name: msg
string.value: D-Delicious. I can really taste the love you put in it!

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, what?

string.name: msg
string.value: Is there a problem?

string.name: msg
string.value: N-no. Of course not.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm off, friendy-poos!

string.name: msg
string.value: What just happened?

string.name: name
string.value: Rocking Opportunity

string.name: info
string.value: I want to dig a trench to trap Aye. A Golem-sized trench. Go Nurture them 3 times to get on their good side.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Golem

string.name: msg
string.value: We need to trap that fairy before she makes somebody sick with all her happy sweetness.

string.name: msg
string.value: She's acting crazy, and that's sort of my thing.

string.name: msg
string.value: You're in on this, right? We have to seize the day. Carpe fairy!

string.name: msg
string.value: You just need to nurture Golems three times. If I know anything about golems, it's that they are very easy to flatter.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now we play the waiting game. I get to go first. Round one... start!

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: Where are all my pally-wals? I'm gonna get sooo wonewy!

string.name: msg
string.value: We've got you! Ha ha! How do you like that?! I also won the waiting game!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, you guys! I really appreciate it. I feel like our friendship is so strong now!

string.name: msg
string.value: Stop being nice! Be mean to me right now!

string.name: name
string.value: Plants: Not Bad

string.name: info
string.value: Plants are wonderful things! I want you to nurture them 3 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Every living thing breathes, just like me! And none of us could do that if it weren't for our plant friends!

string.name: msg
string.value: Plants keep us all alive! All you'd have to do is wipe them out and nobody could live!

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes... I know... mwahaha!

string.name: msg
string.value: Go nurture some silly little plants! At least 3 times!

string.name: msg
string.value: Happy plants mean a happy world!

string.name: msg
string.value: (Maybe I should make a plant that can feel happiness. Also, Aya has gone totally bonkers.)

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to give you something special for alll your hard work.

string.name: name
string.value: Mortal Enemies

string.name: info
string.value: Aya's recent mood upswing has me concerned. Now, as science has stated many times, cows are the true enemies of all plants. Therefore, we play with 5 Bovines to anger the plants and their allies.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Bovines

string.name: msg
string.value: It's time for us to do something Aya. Her endless optimism and friendliness is just... it's weirding me out. It could be plant mind-control.

string.name: msg
string.value: Science has proven that plants hate cows. That's why I want you to go play with 5 cows. Really make sure they have a good time.

string.name: msg
string.value: The joy of those cows is exactly what I needed to get through the rest of this novel. It's so sad! Now, we should do something about Aya...

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: No, I don't like it!

string.name: msg
string.value: But you used to love riding cows!

string.name: msg
string.value: Th-that's... Eeek-!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Umm? What are we-- Oh! Bovine! I'm going to ride that right to the leather factory!

string.name: msg
string.value: You JUST said you didn't want to ride it.

string.name: msg
string.value: (It's as I suspected.)

string.name: name
string.value: The Great Plantavius

string.name: info
string.value: Aya is possessed by the great Plantavius, master of all plants! Please visit another farm, and combine your monster with a Plant 1 time.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with a Plant

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm afraid Aye is possessed by a powerful spirit. The spirit of all plants, to be exact, which I have dubbed the Great Plantavius.

string.name: msg
string.value: Is that why she was being nice to me? Do plants like me?

string.name: msg
string.value: Then her reaction to my drink didn't...

string.name: msg
string.value: What drink?

string.name: msg
string.value: N-nothing! I didn't poison her!

string.name: msg
string.value: The Great Spirit doesn't SEEM to have any malicious intent, but we all know how crafty plants are.

string.name: msg
string.value: Do we have to? She's a lot less horrible like this.

string.name: msg
string.value: I actually agree.

string.name: msg
string.value: Guys...

string.name: msg
string.value: I was joking. She's had far too much screen-time lately. Shut it down.

string.name: msg
string.value: No... plants don't like anyone. They're jerks... Now, we'll need to trick a plant into feeling kinship. Please combine one of your monsters with a Plant.

string.name: msg
string.value: Let me get to work... there's going to be a lot of bone sawing involved.

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: I hope I can help you!

string.name: msg
string.value: Enough with the ruse, Plantavius! We know you're not Aya.

string.name: msg
string.value: What sort of idiotic name is Plantavius? I am Guwaroonernoonernoo! You may call me Guwaru.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hahaha, those are terrible names. I mean, if anybody's going to corrupt and destroy Aya, it's going to be me!

string.name: msg
string.value: I actually agree.

string.name: msg
string.value: Get out of our friend, plant god! You're not welcome here! Go back to your soil!

string.name: msg
string.value: Whatever, I was tired of hanging out with you goobs anyway. I got all kinds of plant friends! I got deciduous friends and evergreen friends and friends that aren't trees. You'll see! You'll all see!!

string.name: msg
string.value: Which one of you creeps hugged me?

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe we should just turn her loose in a forest.

string.name: msg
string.value: Forests are no places for plants, Paolo. Don't be ridiculous.

string.name: msg
string.value: You're so smart, Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey friends! Are you having friend time without me?

string.name: name
string.value: Clara's Gift

string.name: info
string.value: Dr. Jules's birthday is coming. Could you ask around about what kind of gift he wants? While you're at it, play with monsters 10 times so I don't muss my hair.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Soon it'll be Dr. Jules's birthday. The day the world learned to smile.

string.name: msg
string.value: Could you ask around about what kind of things he likes?

string.name: msg
string.value: Is that cheating? Oh, who cares? As long as I win.

string.name: msg
string.value: While you're at it, you can play with monsters on other farms 10 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: What kind of gift do you think Dr. Jules wants?

string.name: name
string.value: What Paolo Wants

string.name: info
string.value: Jules is a creep! What about what I want? An Orange Mini Mushroom and limo service for my dog.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy an Orange Mini Mushroom from the Shop

string.name: msg
string.value: Why do you want to know what Jules wants?

string.name: msg
string.value: Did Clara ask you? She wants to give him something, doesn't she? What about me?!

string.name: msg
string.value: This is just another case of the guy in the hat being oppressed by the guy in the glasses. Well, I'm game. You want to know what he wants?

string.name: msg
string.value: Bring me an Orange Mini Mushroom and I'll tell you.

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules likes Lizard Tails. So much. I've seen him slurp them down raw.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm serious! I think! Get that four-eyed lab rat a tail, and he just goes bonkers.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't tell anybody I helped, or I swear I will send my invisible ninjas after you.

string.name: name
string.value: Every Man Has a Hobby

string.name: info
string.value: Dr. Jules loves... lizard tails? Could you Nurture Reptiles 3 times? Maybe one will fall off.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Reptiles

string.name: msg
string.value: I hope you found out what he wants. I've been practicing my anti-wrinkle meditations.

string.name: msg
string.value: Lizard tails? That's... weirder than I expected.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe he likes lizard TALES! Wonderful stories about reptilian...

string.name: msg
string.value: No. We can work with this, Clara. At least he doesn't eat cotton swabs like the last guy I dated.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm sure you'll go nurture 3 reptiles for me. I couldn't be seen with my hands in the dirt.

string.name: msg
string.value: In the meantime, I'll try to find a matching outfit.

string.name: name
string.value: Not Happening

string.name: info
string.value: Paolo owes me money, so I'm not helping him do anything. Go play with Birds on other farms 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with a Bird

string.name: msg
string.value: So, is handing a chick a bunch of dirty old lizard parts some sort of dating thing, or...

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, wait, those are for Jules? Ha!

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, that's hilarious, but no. I have to teach Paolo a lesson for that five bucks he borrowed to buy anti-fairy spray.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't get me wrong. I'm not being nice to Clara. I just don't want Paolo to win. That fairy spray smells terrible!

string.name: msg
string.value: Take those tails out to some birds. If you could play with 5 birds, we'll get Jules a real present.

string.name: msg
string.value: We'll feed those stinky tails to birds, along with Paolo's dreams! Hahahaha!

string.name: msg
string.value: Where did those lizard tails go? Did they grow into new lizards?

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe those new lizards went over to Dr. Jules's house already and then he stepped on them... or ate them...

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, now I have to come up with ANOTHER gift? All this thinking about other people is giving me crow's feet.

string.name: name
string.value: The Quill is Mightier Than the Tail

string.name: info
string.value: I want to give Dr. Jules a quill. Nurture Birds 3 times, and bring me their Feathers.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Birds

string.name: msg
string.value: I was in the middle of drawing a picture of myself when I thought of the perfect gift for Julesy: a quill pen!

string.name: msg
string.value: He writes so many things down, and he's always complaining about the 'good old days' when pens weren't so 'efficient'.

string.name: msg
string.value: Just go nurture birds 3 times, and bring me their feathers. You have my permission to use force.

string.name: msg
string.value: These will be perfect! He'll be so excited to have this outdated, unhygienic writing instrument, I bet he'll marry me on the spot!

string.name: name
string.value: No Gift, No Problem

string.name: info
string.value: Your farm is empty and I believe it is because of curse-ghosts. But curse-ghosts are scared of monsters, so go combine 3 monsters on another farm!

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: What do you mean Clara decided to go with a quill pen?! That is the greatest present any man can receive!

string.name: msg
string.value: This is the worst...

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait a second. I bet you have curse-ghosts! That's why your farm is empty and everything that happens here is terrible. You need to breed some more monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: Go to another farm, and combine monsters 3 times so that I can stop having bad dating luck.

string.name: msg
string.value: These new monsters have been shrieking all day. And that is MY thing.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm so mad, I haven't had time to make the quill pen. Jules is going to fall in love with another girl and I'll be stuck here with YOU.

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you very much for distracting Clara while I broke into her room. You did not hear me say that.

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift Never Given

string.name: info
string.value: Someone broke all my feathers! I swear if I find out who did this... Just go play with Toys on other farms 5 times while I go into a short rage-coma.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Toys

string.name: msg
string.value: I walked into my room and the feathers were all broken, shaped into little hearts, covered in dog slobber, and spelled out 'Paolo'...

string.name: msg
string.value: Who could have done it?!

string.name: msg
string.value: I bet it was the fairy. She's always been jealous of my hair!

string.name: msg
string.value: But I have a plan to trick them all! Go play with Toys 5 times. I'm going to work out all my fury on an online forum, then start my scheme.

string.name: msg
string.value: I realized that you pretending to get me a new gift was a way better plan than the one I had... now we wait!

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: What is this crazy woman doing now?! I hate this... I... wait a second?! VOODOO! I HAVE BEEN HEXED!

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo runs away with his arms in the air.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ha-ha! Victory! Wait, who was that? Oh, who cares. I feel completely better now.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you see the scary doll I put in the box? It looks just like Paolo's mom, if she were a were-badger. Haha!

string.name: name
string.value: The Flames of Passion

string.name: info
string.value: I'm going to give Julesy a simple gift from the heart. And to do that, I need you to steal candles from Oddities while you play with them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Oddities

string.name: msg
string.value: I've realized that all this gift-giving is not really my style, so I'm going to buy Dr. Jules a cake from the grocery store and be done with it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't want to get his expectations up too high, right? Anyway, I need candles. Go play with 5 Oddities and steal their precious candles.

string.name: msg
string.value: I can almost taste the artificial tears.

string.name: name
string.value: Birthday Joy

string.name: info
string.value: I like to spend my birthdays the way my family did: dangerous medical experiments, followed by hours of screaming at each other. Take this cake to other farms and play with monsters 10 times for me.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules had better like this cake I didn't bake him.

string.name: msg
string.value: Later, at Dr. Jules's house.

string.name: msg
string.value: Happy birthday, Dr. Jules! I baked you a cake! I put the price tags on and everything.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's so thoughtful of you, Clara. It's great of you to do this after I threw you out of that speedboat.

string.name: msg
string.value: Pssh. That's just from the grocery store. Gimme some!

string.name: msg
string.value: No. Don't touch it. It's for my sweet Dr. Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: He's half blind! He won't even notice!

string.name: msg
string.value: Relax! You can all eat this horrible-looking cake. Paolo, Kibbles, you're both basically animals. Do you want some?

string.name: msg
string.value: I do not turn down free food.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (The glasses-man is my new friend!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Now then, I'd like to use this disaster of cake as an experiment on the local farmers' fear tolerance. Take it to their farms and play with monsters 10 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you, everyone, for coming.

string.name: msg
string.value: (Dr. Jules is so dreamy...)

string.name: name
string.value: Cat-Scratch Fever

string.name: info
string.value: If you want to hear my story, do as I say! Nurture Cats & Catlikes 3 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Those two are straight-up suspect! I've spoken to them both at least three times and they have never told me their entire life history!

string.name: msg
string.value: I think you're right. They must be spies. Or criminals! Or celebrities in hiding. Ooh, I bet Jules is in hiding.

string.name: msg
string.value: What are you goons yammering about?

string.name: msg
string.value: FAIRY! Don't curse us, mystical creature!

string.name: msg
string.value: What was that?

string.name: msg
string.value: You have to tell me everything about you, and Dr. Jules, and if you don't, I'll pull off your little wings and glue them to a headband.

string.name: msg
string.value: I actually do not care about Dr. Jules, so you can leave him out.

string.name: msg
string.value: What? You chuckleheads couldn't shake down a leaf. I'll tell you my story, but you gotta do something for me first.

string.name: msg
string.value: I hate doing things for other people!

string.name: msg
string.value: Good! Nurture Cats 3 times for me. I like to see them toyed with.

string.name: msg
string.value: Cats are pretty cute, I guess. If you like stupid fuzzballs.

string.name: name
string.value: Cats and Canine

string.name: info
string.value: I liked watching you guys struggle with those cats. Now I want to see some dog action. Go play with dog-shaped things on other farms 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Canids, Raccoons, & Ferrets

string.name: msg
string.value: That was hilarious! How many times did you get scratched? Now I want to see you covered in drool, so you gotta go play with dogs. BECAUSE I SAID SO.

string.name: msg
string.value: I can't wait to see how much they shed on you.

string.name: msg
string.value: All right, talking butterfly, We did like you said.

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess you've earned a little piece of the Aya story...

string.name: name
string.value: Back in the Day

string.name: info
string.value: You want to know what my life was like? Go play with monsters on other farms 15 times!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Where I come from, it's not this cushy. My family lives in a TREE. You go outside at the wrong time of day, BOOM, eaten by a slime.

string.name: msg
string.value: The fairy forest was beautiful when I went there.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't interrupt me, blondie! You wouldn't last a second in my world.

string.name: msg
string.value: I used to have to fight hornets twice as big as me just to get a milkshake.

string.name: msg
string.value: This all sounds fake...

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, Kibbles knows what I'm talking about. He can smell it on me!

string.name: msg
string.value: Dang, Kibbles, I didn't realize you had such a hard life.

string.name: msg
string.value: You want to know what my life was like? Go play with monsters on other farms 15 times!

string.name: msg
string.value: You see? You see what it's like to have wet noses and dirty hands pressed all up in your face? Do you?! MONSTER LIFE.

string.name: name
string.value: The Thirst

string.name: info
string.value: I'm thirsty from painting all those word-pictures. Get an Big Barrel on your farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Purchase an Big Barrel

string.name: msg
string.value: You want to know how hard my life was? Let me tell you about my dad...

string.name: msg
string.value: Wake me up when we find out she's a vampire.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, I need something to drink. I'm getting all parched.

string.name: msg
string.value: Get an Big Barrel from the shop, and I'll tell you all about my mean old dad.

string.name: msg
string.value: That hit the spot! So, my dad is this totally old geezer. I get caught fairy-dusting a car ONE TIME and he's like, 'honey, you should probably get a better hobby.' Can you believe that?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, I think this little girl was being mean to her dad.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I would greatly enjoy a treat.)

string.name: msg
string.value: What?! You don't know me!

string.name: msg
string.value: This story is a lot more boring than I was hoping for.

string.name: msg
string.value: You guys don't understand me!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: msg
string.value: She didn't even ask about my life story once...

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof... (So, no treat?)

string.name: name
string.value: Cross Examination

string.name: info
string.value: Take care of monsters 5 times while I get my notes.

string.name: msg
string.value: I am beginning to believe that Aya is exaggerating about how bad her life was.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did anybody see a mouse with suspenders and gloves run in here? He looks cute, but I think he just put a mob hit on me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hahaha, you're so funny, Julesy! Tell me your entire life history right now.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm sorry, but that violates the doctor-patient confidentiality agreement I have with myself. If you want to know about Aya though... she's a real piece of work.

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess...

string.name: msg
string.value: I have a notebook full of gossip on her back at my place. I write in it every night before I get in my hyperbaric chamber.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, I'd love to see your poetry! Go get it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, but you have to do all of my work for the next week. The licensing board is on my backside and I can't have them know I'm still practicing medicine.

string.name: msg
string.value: Nurture monsters 5 times for me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't talk to Jules when he gets back. I want his full attention.

string.name: name
string.value: Once Upon a Time

string.name: info
string.value: I hope you're ready for this story.

string.name: todo
string.value: Listen to Dr. Jules

string.name: msg
string.value: Sorry I'm late. I was right about that mob hit...

string.name: msg
string.value: Now then, it all began when the Great Spirit Guwaru had an ominous dream.

string.name: msg
string.value: Is that the crazy Spirit that possessed Aya?

string.name: msg
string.value: Probably, but he was a lot less regal than I was expecting.

string.name: msg
string.value: I didn't know Aya was so important. I should stop trapping her in jars.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, she's got connections. She always refers to Guwaru as her father, but he's actually just a tree spirit she mooches off of instead of getting a real job.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want her life.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes... don't we all...

string.name: msg
string.value: When Guwaru woke up from his bad dream, Aya was standing there, presumably about to deface him with fairy dust.

string.name: msg
string.value: What are his dreams like?

string.name: msg
string.value: Plants always dream of the day every human on earth is burnt into fertilizer by the sun. It's scientific fact.

string.name: msg
string.value: When Guwaru met Aya, he took her under his branch, and tried to make her into the killing machine he'd always wanted. But, she spent all of her time hanging around outside convenience stores, yelling at old ladies.

string.name: msg
string.value: That sounds plausible.

string.name: msg
string.value: So, Guwaru created Monster Life to get this lazy fairy to do something useful with her life.

string.name: msg
string.value: I thought she was on probation or something. And if this 'Great Spirit' wanted to get rid of her, why didn't he just... eat her?

string.name: msg
string.value: Unfortunately, he's a vegetarian.

string.name: msg
string.value: So, he wants US to eat her. Now it all makes sense!

string.name: msg
string.value: I hope he possesses Aya again! Maybe he has a good recipe for fairy seasoning.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I will eat her!)

string.name: msg
string.value: I think we can all agree that she would be delicious. But Guwaru is also a pacifist, and you know how uppity they get when things don't go their way.

string.name: msg
string.value: What about you, Dr. Jules?

string.name: msg
string.value: Funny story... I was supposed to meet a very gregarious pirate named Twinklebeard there to... let's not talk about why, but I met Aya instead. She said she had something to show me around the corner... then I woke up here.

string.name: msg
string.value: Then she dumped her work on you and ran off? Brilliant.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's so Aya!

string.name: msg
string.value: It worked out well for me, though. The malpractice suits were really piling up before I came here.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, Julesy, you're the worst.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ha ha ha! Why am I laughing?!

string.name: name
string.value: Puppy Parade

string.name: info
string.value: Combine your monster with a dog! Bring me a puppy that will make Clara happy.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with Canids, Raccoons, & Ferrets

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, hahaha! Come help me make risotto!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof!

string.name: msg
string.value: What does that dog have that I don't? Why doesn't he ever want ME to help make risotto?

string.name: msg
string.value: It's not that I want Paolo to think I like him, but SOMEBODY has to pay attention to me.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll show them. I'll get my own dog and it will be the most beautiful dog on the planet!

string.name: msg
string.value: Where did Clara go? Kibbles wants her to help make risotto.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, if Clara had a dog, she would have to let it play with Kibbles, and we could be together all the time!

string.name: msg
string.value: Combine your monster with a Canid, Raccoon, or Ferret right now. And don't let it come out all weird like a Whippet or a Borzoi. I know a lot about dogs.

string.name: msg
string.value: How did it go?

string.name: msg
string.value: This thing is horrible. Maybe I can blind Clara right before I give it to her. Like a 'sorry about your eyeballs, here's a puppy to make it up' sort of thing.

string.name: name
string.value: Dogs for Cats

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (Combine your monster with a Cat so I can bark at it!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with a Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Hello! Hello!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof, woof! (I want a kitten! Also bacon! But also a kitten!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Combine your monster with a cat! I will bark at the cat!)

string.name: msg
string.value: What's going on? Did my stalker buy me dead flowers again?

string.name: msg
string.value: What manner of beast is this? I am scared by the lack of scales and eye-patch, but I want to name it Dr. Tumbles.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Why does the thing have claws?!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, you need to work on your manners.

string.name: name
string.value: Man's Best Friend

string.name: info
string.value: I want Clara to see how loyal and loving canine can be, so go Nurture some.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Canids, Raccoons, & Ferrets

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, why are you always trying to steal my thunder? It is mine! It is MY thunder.

string.name: msg
string.value: See how Kibbles likes me, even when I take away his favorite chew toy, which I refer to as 'my thunder'? I think Clara should see how loyal he is.

string.name: msg
string.value: Good! That was perfect!

string.name: msg
string.value: I was unimpressed by your connection to the canine, but at least Clara got to see how fun they are.

string.name: name
string.value: Cat Scan

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (Play with Cats! They are so funny!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Wait!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof, woof! (Cats are smelly and mean, but they are good at playing!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Play with cats! Play with cats!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Bring me a cat! I want to see a cat!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, why do you keep doing this to me? This is not about you. This is Clara's choice!

string.name: name
string.value: Pick Your Poison

string.name: info
string.value: Every monster will love me!

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara? Cats or dogs?

string.name: msg
string.value: Is this why you called me away from my vanity internet searches? I ought to...

string.name: msg
string.value: Chill out, sunshine head! Just pick one.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Cats! Cats!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, I choose...

string.name: msg
string.value: Which one would love me more? Can I have one of each, to get two doses of adoration?

string.name: msg
string.value: That is not a terrible idea!

string.name: msg
string.value: Who cares what kind of monster it is?

string.name: msg
string.value: Just get as many as you can to prove that you're more important than anyone else!

string.name: name
string.value: Blooming Shrub

string.name: info
string.value: Plant a Blooming Shrub to make things more spring-y!

string.name: todo
string.value: Plant a Blooming Shrub

string.name: msg
string.value: Jiminy jillickers, spring is dan-diddly-icious!

string.name: msg
string.value: You should get a nice Blooming Shrub from the shop to celebrate!

string.name: msg
string.value: *Sniff Sniff* These flowers smell lovely! Hahaha!

string.name: name
string.value: Exuberant Blossoms

string.name: info
string.value: Plant 2 Spring Flower Trees on your farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Plant 2 Spring Flower Trees

string.name: msg
string.value: Your farm is too big for a little shrubby-wubby to make any difference!

string.name: msg
string.value: We need trees! ALL the trees! Or just two of the trees. Let there be spring!

string.name: msg
string.value: The smell of flowers, wittle bittle critters flying around! I'm in heaven!

string.name: msg
string.value: Mmm... Zzzzz...

string.name: msg
string.value: The Great Spirit falls is out cold.

string.name: name
string.value: Avian Serenade

string.name: info
string.value: Nothing says spring like birds singing sweet nothings to me. Combine your monster with a Bird.
