string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with a Bird

string.name: msg
string.value: Why doesn't your farm look like a festering junk hole? What did you do?

string.name: msg
string.value: (You explain the Great Spirit's strange obsession with spring.)

string.name: msg
string.value: I see, some trumped up tree tells you to buy things, and you jump right on it. But when I ask for ONE platinum-coated tiger head, you get upset.

string.name: msg
string.value: The only way for you to make up this springtime debaucle is to get some birds here. I like the way it sounds like they're talking to me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Combine your monster with a Bird, and I'll forget you trying to get buddy-buddy with the walking garden.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm ready, birds! Shower me with your love!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Why don't these things sound like birds? Where are the croaks and the screeches?

string.name: name
string.value: Definitely Frogs

string.name: info
string.value: Spring isn't spring without the sounds of frogs yelling at each other. Combine your monster with a Reptile, even though that is not what a frog is.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with a Reptile

string.name: msg
string.value: Has anybody seen my favorite watch? It is see-through and full of jelly beans.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hush, Paolo. We're trying to control animals.

string.name: msg
string.value: (You explain the Great Spirit's strange obsession with spring.)

string.name: msg
string.value: You need some frogs. When I was growing up, I would put frogs in my pockets and then my pants would jump away.

string.name: msg
string.value: But amphibians are weird. I don't know how to make them. You should combine your monster with a reptile, and see if it works.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you defy the laws of nature?!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...My pants! WHERE DID MY PANTS GO?!

string.name: info
string.value: Okay, these birds have got to stop waking me up. Nurture them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Birds

string.name: msg
string.value: Wh-what's that sound? Why are there jackhammers on your farm?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hello, Great Spirit! Welcome to Maple World! Would you like a side salad?

string.name: msg
string.value: Leave me alone, creepwad! These pecking birds are driving me nuts! Get them outta here! And stop calling me Great Spirit!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, no! The Great Spirit has been angered! Please nurture those Birds to make them hush up!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aww, jeezy weezy guys! It's so peaceful and quiet now!

string.name: name
string.value: Give Peace a Chance

string.name: info
string.value: It's so loud, I can't enjoy the springtime scenery! Go Nurture Reptiles!

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Reptiles

string.name: msg
string.value: I came to take a nap on your farm and you've got all these horrible croaking things. You gotta do something... this is cruel and unusual punishment.

string.name: msg
string.value: I command you, in the name of the Great Spirit! Make those reptiles be quiet!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ah, all right... this whole Great Spirit thing is working out for me. Everything's comin' up Aya!

string.name: msg
string.value: She is not the Great Spirit. It's obviously just Aya.

string.name: msg
string.value: Poor Clara, you haven't been touched by the spirit. Perhaps one day, my sweet.

string.name: msg
string.value: Gross, don't touch my face with your dog hands.

string.name: name
string.value: The Great Farm Contest

string.name: info
string.value: Glory and prizes await! We need to combine new monsters.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Have you heard? There's a contest for who has the best farm! This is our chance to have my superiority written in print forever!

string.name: msg
string.value: I think there are prizes and things too, but who cares about junk, right?

string.name: msg
string.value: We need to start with a complete revamp of the farm. If you're going to win this for me, you're going to need to actually TRY to make it look nice here.

string.name: msg
string.value: For starters, let's combine some new monsters. You need them happy and healthy to get a good grade.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, yes... they look like they'll do nicely.

string.name: name
string.value: A Quick Feeding

string.name: info
string.value: Judges really like it when it looks like you feed your monsters, so Nurture them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Monsters are such a drag! They just want to eat and eat, and take and take.

string.name: msg
string.value: Please Nurture your monsters so they look good for the judges.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your monsters look much happier. The judges will love that.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now we can win this thing for sure.

string.name: info
string.value: Your farm needs to look beautiful, like me. Buy some Buildings and Decor from the Shop to get 700 Aesthetic Points.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get 700 Aesthetic Points

string.name: msg
string.value: I just looked through some of the other contestants, and we're in bad shape. Their farms are so much prettier than yours.

string.name: msg
string.value: You need to get your Aesthetic Points up to 700. Anything less looks like you're not even trying, and you ARE trying... or else.

string.name: msg
string.value: That should meet the minimum requirement.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now all we have to do is crush the competition with sabotage!

string.name: name
string.value: Competitor Crushing 101

string.name: info
string.value: Always compete fair and square, when the judges are looking! Visit other farms and play with their monsters.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters on Other Farms

string.name: msg
string.value: I don't think we're going to get your farm any prettier...

string.name: msg
string.value: The only option we have now is to destroy the competition. I brought some seeds that will turn any farm into a toxic, radioactive hotbed of death and--

string.name: msg
string.value: HOLD IT RIGHT THERE!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya! Geez, I was going to let you help!

string.name: msg
string.value: You two boneheads can't mess with the Great Farm Contest. Let's just say I have a vested interest in how it turns out this year.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, Great Spirit. Will you not allow two mortals a simple chance to prove that I am beautiful?

string.name: msg
string.value: No! You guys go to another farm and play with their animals. I have a few phone calls to make...

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, I did some talking, and now I think it's okay if you two cheat.

string.name: msg
string.value: B-but, I already threw away the seeds! Sheesh... winning a contest is hard.

string.name: name
string.value: Contest Results

string.name: info
string.value: We didn't get first place, but at least we got some money. Use it to buy some new stuff!

string.name: msg
string.value: The contest results are in! How much did they love me? Let me see, let me see!

string.name: msg
string.value: 'Congratulations, you have been chosen as a runner-up in the Great-- 2,000 Warus?!'

string.name: msg
string.value: This place got runner-up?! I must be prettier than I thought. They even sent me... I mean, us, money!

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to spend my half on a new gold replica of my face.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe you could put in some more mirrors with your half?

string.name: name
string.value: Pop Quiz, Hot Shot 1

string.name: info
string.value: What color are the shag carpets in my grandmother's basement? Put a cube of the same color on your farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy a Green Cube

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, play video games with me! I'm bored!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof! (Play ball with me! I'm bored!)

string.name: msg
string.value: You don't have to talk bad about my appearance, Kibbles.

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo, you look bored. I have some medication for that...

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules! I do not have anything to do and I am contemplating purchasing a treadmill for exercise.

string.name: msg
string.value: Exercise is for people with low self-denial, Paolo. How about a nice pop quiz instead?

string.name: msg
string.value: If that is another word for test, I would like to throw you in a lake.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't worry. I'll keep it simple.

string.name: msg
string.value: Just pay attention to my riddles and buy the right Cubes to place on the farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: I have already forgotten what we were talking about.

string.name: msg
string.value: Keep your mind clear! Question one!

string.name: msg
string.value: What color are the shag carpets in my grandmother's basement? Place a cube of that color on your farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hint: It's green. Oh, shoot, I shouldn't have told you that.

string.name: msg
string.value: I remember I was once choked half-to-death by one of those and it was green.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's right!

string.name: name
string.value: Pop Quiz, Hot Shot 2

string.name: info
string.value: What color do whales hate? (Hint: Look up at the sky.)

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy a Blue Cube

string.name: msg
string.value: Aren't quizzes magical?

string.name: msg
string.value: They are often created by lonely wizards, yes.

string.name: msg
string.value: Well then, you can call me a wizard... of knowledge!

string.name: msg
string.value: What color do whales hate?

string.name: msg
string.value: Hint: Blue. It drives them into a killing frenzy every time they-- CURSES, I gave you the answer again!

string.name: msg
string.value: Blue! Like the sky! Or the color I turn when I forget to breathe!

string.name: msg
string.value: These questions are far too easy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, luckily I am an expert on whale-fury and old-lady carpets.

string.name: name
string.value: Pop Quiz, Hot Shot 3

string.name: info
string.value: What color would you get if you threw a Flame and Soul Spirit into a blender? (Hint: It's the name of a fruit and a boutique tube amplifier.)

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy an Orange Cube

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, this one's going to set your synapses on fire!

string.name: msg
string.value: What color would you get if you threw a Flame and Soul Spirit into a blender?

string.name: msg
string.value: Hint: It's the name of a fruit.

string.name: msg
string.value: I don't remember what the question was, but I'll give it to you anyway!

string.name: msg
string.value: YES! I win by default!

string.name: msg
string.value: It's a good thing Kibbles wasn't here. He always cheats and looks stuff up online.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, what was that last question I asked? It's going to drive me crazy!

string.name: name
string.value: A Clean Break

string.name: info
string.value: I need to... leave some things in your trashcan. Which you don't have yet. So I'm making you a trashcan. Just go play with 3 plants while I work.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Why don't you have a trash can?

string.name: msg
string.value: Where am I supposed to throw my illegal medical waste? We'll need to fix this right away. You go get me some wood from Plants, and I'll start on the construction.

string.name: msg
string.value: You're lucky I took those woodshop classes at the adult learning annex.

string.name: msg
string.value: Here's the trashcan. Don't look inside.

string.name: info
string.value: Y'all need to get me some Dragon Scales. I could make a swank new lamp or some dragon scale harem pants. Go play with Dragons 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Dragons

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey there, Farmer No-Show. I figured since you're always showin' up when YOU need something, I'd return the favor.

string.name: msg
string.value: You gonna help me, or what?

string.name: msg
string.value: Y'all need to get me some Dragon Scales. I could make a swank new lamp or some dragon scale harem pants. Go play with Dragons 5 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess I COULD just make stuff out of boring old wood, but y'all are so picky.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, these are beautiful. Just lovely.

string.name: msg
string.value: But I'm gonna need one more teeny-weeny little favor...

string.name: info
string.value: Fairies carry all kinds of valuables, and I ain't exactly the mugging type. Please play with Fairies 5 times for me, would ya?

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Fairies

string.name: msg
string.value: Fairies get all the best merchandise, but they're just greedy little monsters when it comes to driving a deal.

string.name: msg
string.value: Go play with some Fairies 5 times and bring me back those goodies.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look, this is for YOU, okay? I'm trying to get the best merchandise I can for your farm, so don't even sass me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, these are more valuable than I expected.

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Cape

string.name: info
string.value: I heard ghosts wear invisible capes. Do you know how much trouble I could cause with one of those? Play with Ghosts & Goblins 5 times, and get me one!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Ghosts & Goblins

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, you wanna know why Ghosts are invisible?

string.name: msg
string.value: When you die, you get a free invisibility cape! I've been thinking about going into a coma for a minute to see if I can snag one before I come back.

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess you COULD just play with Ghosts & Goblins 5 times, and bring me one back.

string.name: msg
string.value: Gimme, gimme!

string.name: msg
string.value: Say, can you see me? You can't can you?

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, you can?! That punk lied to me!

string.name: msg
string.value: That snake oil shilling butterball! I'm gonna put such a hex on him!

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: Honey, if you don't know the difference between swamp legends and the truth, I can't help you.

string.name: msg
string.value: I tell you what... you're dumb, young, and pretty. Gimme that cape, and I'll give you some candies.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aww, man, you know my one weakness.

string.name: name
string.value: Candies for Hats

string.name: info
string.value: Jimmy-Jack said he'd give me candies if I bring Humanoid Hats. Candies! Play with Humanoid monsters 5 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Aliens & Humanoids

string.name: msg
string.value: When I was growing up, my father would tell me about these great Humanoid hats, but I could never find one.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now Jimmy-Jack tells me he'll give me candies if I bring him one! Candies! Do you understand how important this is?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Play with Aliens & Humanoids 5 times for me. Now, before I rage out on you.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh yes... I am GETTING some candy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: Is this a spear hole? Why did you stab a hat?

string.name: msg
string.value: Gimme my candy!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, all right, all right. You can have SOME.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want that bag.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll give you all the candy you want, little honeypie. These things are more precious than your teeny tiny toes.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, what?

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't mind me. I'm just bein' folksy!

string.name: name
string.value: It's Trendemon

string.name: info
string.value: Play with Devils 5 times. You might find some valuables or a cool pitchfork.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Devils

string.name: msg
string.value: Devils like to snare people up with their worldly desires. Kind of like me, but with less panache.

string.name: msg
string.value: Their favorite playthings are jewels, and boy howdy, are they valuable.

string.name: msg
string.value: Why don't you go play with some Devils 5 times? I'm sure your soul will be fine.

string.name: msg
string.value: Lucky day, lucky day!

string.name: msg
string.value: *Ahem* Are you still here?

string.name: msg
string.value: Later on...

string.name: msg
string.value: When did I buy seven stuffed armadillos? That seems like a purchase I'd remember...

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, look how regal I look in these jewels and this hat! Like a little round king.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hello, merchant person. Are you adorning yourself in kingly robes to feel powerful?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh! You startled me. I was taking inventory.

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you wearing new clothes? I'm asking even though I don't remember ever meeting you. It is what polite people do.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, um, yes, I suppose I have a new suit.

string.name: msg
string.value: You look expensive. Can I buy you and the items Aya brought you?

string.name: msg
string.value: How much are you willing to pay?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (The tiny-man sparkles. I must jump on him.)

string.name: name
string.value: Fancy Feast

string.name: info
string.value: Man, I hate cats! They keep trying to bat at me when I throw rocks at their faces. Go play with some Cats and distract them!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you know that cats can survive high falls?

string.name: msg
string.value: They need time to adjust in the air. That's when they're weak. They also can't eat onions or too much salt.

string.name: msg
string.value: Everybody back home says I'm too dumb to study, but I know my enemies. I KNOW THEM.

string.name: msg
string.value: Except, every time I try to attack a cat, I get caught up looking at their dopey little faces and I get whapped by a paw. That ain't fair!

string.name: msg
string.value: I need you to go play with some so I can see how to take down their cute defenses.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm gonna go study up on surprise tactics. Go to other farms and play with cats 5 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: Where are all the scratch marks? Why don't you smell like pee?! How are you doing this?!

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm gonna go ask Four-Eyes what he knows about cats. I bet he's better at dealing with them than you are.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: name
string.value: Herding Cats

string.name: info
string.value: I'm a cat expert now. Go nurture your Cats 3 times with the mad skills I taught you.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: You know all that stuff I told you earlier? Child's play. I'm a cat master now.

string.name: msg
string.value: So where all the kitties at? How'm I supposed to practice my cat whispering if you ain't gonna provide me with cats? That's ridiculous.

string.name: msg
string.value: Make sure you have plenty of cats for me to hang out with. I want like a whole cat army. And nurture them 3 times. I don't like 'em scrawny.

string.name: msg
string.value: Look at all these cats!

string.name: msg
string.value: Is this a new trend? Should I get my own cats?

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, is this part of Aya's new plan to be queen of the cats? How many idiot farmers did she convince to breed new cats?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Why would you even have cats on a farm that doesn't have rats? You can't milk them.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'll have to talk to that little flying headache about this.

string.name: name
string.value: The Day the Kittens Attacked

string.name: info
string.value: YES, my cat army is eating all your birds. NO, I'm not going to pay you back. Just go play with your Birds 6 times to make them feel better.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Birds

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, things have gotten a LITTLE out of hand, but it's not my fault. On the up-side, I do have an army of cats now. On the down-side...

string.name: msg
string.value: They're eating pretty much everything that even looks like a bird.

string.name: msg
string.value: For some reason, they seem to think that birds are the mortal enemies of fairies. They probably think that because that's what I told them.

string.name: msg
string.value: As much as I love seeing those snooty feather-faces get what's coming, I think you might want to go play with them long enough to keep the cats distracted.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe play with them 6 times? I told about ten thousand farmers to breed cats, and six times ten thousand equals sixty thousand, so... I don't know, I flunked math pretty hard.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya flew away in a hurry.

string.name: msg
string.value: What is going on here?

string.name: msg
string.value: I was helping a cat eat a bird and then they all stopped! What do I do with a half-eaten bird?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I will eat the bird.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, Kibbles wants me to mount it on my bookshelf. You're so DIY, Kibs!

string.name: name
string.value: Mushroom Nostalgia

string.name: info
string.value: Nurture 3 Mushrooms, for old times' sake.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Mushrooms

string.name: msg
string.value: Do you remember the first time we met? I taught you how to build a Mushroom House. You taught me how to smile when talking to people beneath me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's nurture Mushrooms 3 times for old times' sake.

string.name: msg
string.value: Mushrooms aren't cuter than ME, are they? I knew I'd find a reason for buying that frying pan.

string.name: name
string.value: Desert Giant Ice Cream Thieves

string.name: info
string.value: Desert Giants sound ugly, and I only like to look at beautiful things. Build a Mushking Empire Outpost to scare them away!

string.name: todo
string.value: Build a Mushking Empire Outpost

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara! Wherever could you be?

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm right in front of your nose, silly. How could you miss me? How could anyone miss me?

string.name: msg
string.value: Let me remove these contacts Jules gave me that I don't need. There you are! What are you up to?

string.name: msg
string.value: We're reminiscing. Isn't it strange how I look younger and more beautiful the older I get? Is that why sought me out, to compliment me?

string.name: msg
string.value: No. I'm here to warn you. Desert Giants are coming!

string.name: msg
string.value: What are Desert Giants? Are the going to lift me on their shoulders while I toss my hair and wave? I've been practicing.

string.name: msg
string.value: No! Jules said they always migrate through here at this time of year, but Kibbles told me they're coming to steal our ice cream!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, no! I need that ice cream to keep my hands soft. I use it as a lotion.

string.name: msg
string.value: We have to to stop them. I know the perfect people for the job: Mushking Empire guards!

string.name: msg
string.value: Build a Mushking Empire Outpost. If that doesn't scare the Desert Giants away, perhaps your face will.

string.name: msg
string.value: My skin is safe, now that the Mushking Empire mush-soldiers are standing guard.

string.name: info
string.value: Play with Soldiers & Sailors on other people's farms 5 times. They'll feel obligated to send us reinforcements.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Soldiers & Sailors

string.name: msg
string.value: Why haven't the Desert Giants turned around? Are they really that jealous of my soft skin?

string.name: msg
string.value: Pfft, you think a couple of tiny mushrooms can stop sand giants? There's no room in that head of yours for anything except air, is there?

string.name: msg
string.value: Why, yes! I DID begin a new air-flush treatment on my brain! Thank you for noticing!

string.name: msg
string.value: We don't have time for compliments, Aya! We have to do something about the Desert Giants!

string.name: msg
string.value: I have a philosophy: when all else fails, wait for someone else to fix your problems! Go to other farms and ask their Soldiers & Sailors for help!

string.name: msg
string.value: Play with Soldiers & Sailors on other people's farms 5 times. They'll feel obligated to send us reinforcements.

string.name: msg
string.value: Have no fear, Clara! Reinforcements are here!

string.name: msg
string.value: I KNOW! Three of the Soldiers have already proposed to me.

string.name: msg
string.value: You turned them down, right? Clara?

string.name: name
string.value: Huff, and Puff, and...

string.name: info
string.value: Clara thinks a couple of Windmills will blow the Desert Giants away. Might as well humor her.

string.name: todo
string.value: Build 2 Windmills

string.name: msg
string.value: The Soldiers & Sailors couldn't stop the Desert Giants, but I've got a brilliant idea. Windmills!

string.name: msg
string.value: You should strike the word 'idea' out of your vocabulary. This can't end well.

string.name: msg
string.value: If we build Windmills, we can blow the giants away, the same way my hairdryer blew the mud mask out of my hair this morning!

string.name: msg
string.value: Windmills don't CREATE wind, they HARNESS it to create energ-- You know what? Nevermind. Go ahead and try it.

string.name: msg
string.value: So? Did it work? Did you blow the giants away?

string.name: msg
string.value: I don't understand. The windmills didn't have any effect on the giants whatsoever!

string.name: msg
string.value: Told ya! Now I have to hunt down my bookie and collect my winnings. Odds were 10 to 1 that you'd be right. By the way, Paolo is my bookie.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: name
string.value: The Best Medicine

string.name: info
string.value: Nurture your monsters 10 times while I have a chat with the Desert Giants.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Good, everyone's here!

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules! You've come to save us!

string.name: msg
string.value: Actually, I just wanted to pass out mandatory samples of this new anti-underwear medicine I'm testing, but what's the problem?

string.name: msg
string.value: The Desert Giants are coming! They're going to stomp my face into the ground, and that's not a good angle for me. Trust me, I've tested it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, that. Just ask them to take a detour. Desert Giants are reasonable creatures.

string.name: msg
string.value: That isn't going to work. Even the Mushking Empire guards and the Soldiers we hired haven't been able to deter them.

string.name: msg
string.value: Trust me. I once owed a Desert Giant money, and he broke my arm instead of my back when I asked him nicely.

string.name: msg
string.value: Nurture your monsters 10 times while I have a chat with the Desert Giants.

string.name: msg
string.value: I can't believe it. The Desert Giants are heading in a different direction!

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm a little disappointed to discovered they're so fickle, actually.

string.name: msg
string.value: Like I've always said, conversation is the best medicine. After hot sauce and tears, obviously.

string.name: msg
string.value: Whew! I guess I can stop building this jet pack. By the way, be careful the next time you start your car. It might explode.

string.name: name
string.value: Animals Have Feelings, Too

string.name: info
string.value: We need to make it rain by playing with Bovines 3 times. That makes sense, if you don't think about it too hard.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Bovines

string.name: msg
string.value: Look at the grass, Clara! It's wilting.

string.name: msg
string.value: It looks fine to me.

string.name: msg
string.value: No, it's turning yellow because it hasn't rained lately.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, you silly little thing. It's never rained, ever, in all the time I've lived here.

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you serious? That's awful! We have to fix that!

string.name: msg
string.value: Must we? I have an appointment to get my nose hair plucked in half an hour.

string.name: msg
string.value: Of course, or everyone will think you're a bad person!

string.name: msg
string.value: I AM a bad person, but I can't have people knowing that. What can we do to make it rain?

string.name: msg
string.value: Collect animal energy for a, um, rain-making ritual. Head to other farms and play with Bovines 3 times. This has nothing whatsoever to do with the 'Animals Have Feelings, Too' community service I've been forced to participate in.

string.name: msg
string.value: You have the Bovine energy? Great! Just give it here.

string.name: name
string.value: This Little Piggy

string.name: info
string.value: Next, we need Pig energy. Keep this up, and I'll be done with my community service in time to go roller skating.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Pigs

string.name: msg
string.value: Great, next on the 'Animals Have Feelings, Too' checklist... Pig energy.

string.name: msg
string.value: What I mean, of course, is that we need Pig energy to offer the Spirits so they'll make it rain!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hand over that Pig energy carefully. Wouldn't want to waste all this work you're doing for me!

string.name: name
string.value: Plants Are Sorta Like Animals

string.name: info
string.value: Play with Plants to make it rain. Don't think about it, just DO it.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Next up is Plant energy. I'm kind of surprised they categorize Plants as 'animals', but whatever. I'm almost done!

string.name: msg
string.value: Sweet! All done with my community service. Oh, but you're expecting a rain-making ritual, aren't you?

string.name: name
string.value: Make It Rain

string.name: info
string.value: Nurture Spirits & Sentinels to complete the rain-making ritual.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Spirits & Sentinels

string.name: msg
string.value: Now, uh, go nurture Spirits & Sentinels. Just once should do it.

string.name: msg
string.value: They'll send down so much rain, the fields'll drown in it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Make it snappy. I have things to do.

string.name: msg
string.value: It's raining! Hooray!

string.name: msg
string.value: What are you talking about? I don't feel any rain!

string.name: msg
string.value: You don't? There must be something wrong with you.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's impossible! W-wait. I feel the rain now. It... It's drenching my hair and ruining my dress! H-How wonderful!

string.name: msg
string.value: (Clara is such a spaz.)

string.name: msg
string.value: We've saved the world, haven't we? Now I'm not only beautiful, I'm also a hero!

string.name: msg
string.value: Right-o. You stay here and enjoy the 'rain'. I'm going to turn in these forms.

string.name: name
string.value: For the Opossums

string.name: info
string.value: Spruce up the area by getting 1,100 Aesthetic Points. The more Aesthetic Points we have, the more benefits the farm will get.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get 1,100 Aesthetic Points

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi, Jules. I picked these flowers for you so you can give them to me as a gift.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ah, perfect! I think I'll feed them to the opossums I'm breeding as test subjects.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, are these for me? Why, thank you, Jules. You shouldn't have!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey! You stole my flowers!

string.name: msg
string.value: I love pretty things. As long as they're not prettier than me, because then I feel insecure.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now I need new flowers. Spruce up the area by getting 1,100 Aesthetic Points. The more Aesthetic Points we have, the more benefits the farm will get.

string.name: msg
string.value: We're not going to make it TOO pretty, right? If so, I need to dab on another layer of make-up.

string.name: msg
string.value: Speaking of make-up, here's a tube of lipstick I no longer want because it's killed too many of my opossums. You can have it, Clara.

string.name: msg
string.value: The farm looks amazing. It's making me self-conscious. I need to call my shrink.

string.name: msg
string.value: Mouse over the Clover icon at the top of the screen to see the benefits you've earned. 'Ever-lasting Test Opossum Love' should be on the list. No?

string.name: msg
string.value: Which reminds me, the lipstick you gave me works great as a nail filer, Jules. Thanks so much!

string.name: msg
string.value: Just wait until you apply it on your lips!

string.name: name
string.value: Storage Space

string.name: info
string.value: Buy a Green Mushroom Hut with your new Aesthetic Points discount.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy a Green Mushroom House

string.name: msg
string.value: You've collected so many Aesthetic Points that you'll get a discount when you buy stuff, which comes in handy for me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Buy a Green Mushroom Hut. I need a place to store body part from botched monster surgeries.

string.name: msg
string.value: The more Aesthetic Points you have, the more discounts you'll get when purchasing items, the more Warus your buildings can store, and the higher the chance of special merchants visiting your farm.

string.name: msg
string.value: The more ice cream I'll have to buy to feel better about myself, too!

string.name: name
string.value: Categorically Hilarious

string.name: info
string.value: Monkeys and Bears have been scientifically proven to look hilarious together. We should study them carefully to see how their comedy works.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Monkeys & Bears

string.name: msg
string.value: There are still so many unknowns in the science of Monster Combination. It would be SO much easier to just sew them together.

string.name: msg
string.value: My previous research on unusual monster combinations was fascinating, even if the government deemed my lab a 'wretched entrance to the Nether realm'. Bureaucrats, am I right?

string.name: msg
string.value: Wouldn't it be fun if we made a new lab here?

string.name: msg
string.value: I was just beginning my research on Monkeys & Bears, because they just make me giggle so much when they wear hats! Go nurture them 5 times, and I'll record the results.

string.name: msg
string.value: Haha! H-have you seen the picture of the bear on a unicycle? Why does he think he's people?! He's a bear!

string.name: msg
string.value: I think we're going to need to consult the Great Spirit. I bet he's a master of interspecies comedy routines.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, may I speak to the Great Spirit?

string.name: msg
string.value: You can do whatever you want, just don't try to make me join another cult.

string.name: msg
string.value: Cults are no laughing matter, Aya. Unless they're laughing cults. Haha... HAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHA!

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you step on one of your needles again?

string.name: name
string.value: Channeling for Chuckles

string.name: info
string.value: I'll have to wait until Aya's not paying attention to get the Great Spirit to come out. For now, let's get in touch with 2 Grade A Monkeys & Bears.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get Monkeys & Bears to Grade A

string.name: msg
string.value: THE GREAT SPIRIT GUWARU HAS ARISEN IN THIS--

string.name: msg
string.value: I've got you surrounded, Guwaru! Answer my questions!

string.name: msg
string.value: What? I was... I was about to.

string.name: msg
string.value: I won't fall for your spirit ruses.

string.name: msg
string.value: You cut me off in the middle of my whole speech. I was going to do the big-arms thing...

string.name: msg
string.value: Tell me why you stuck Monkeys and Bears in the same category!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, uh...

string.name: msg
string.value: If you look very closely at Monkeys and Bears, you will see the reason...

string.name: msg
string.value: You must study them closely before invoking my majesty again! Or... or else!

string.name: msg
string.value: Typical. I should just looked online. Now YOU'RE going to have to get 2 Grade-A Monkeys & Bears.

string.name: msg
string.value: Guwaru was just telling me about the time he accidentally ate an entire family of squirrels that was nesting in his belly! Hilarious!

string.name: msg
string.value: You should have seen their little faces!

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, back to business.

string.name: msg
string.value: What business?

string.name: msg
string.value: ...I thought you'd help me talk to the Great Spirit some more.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, he just took off. He said he thought his oven was on.

string.name: name
string.value: On My Lonesome

string.name: info
string.value: If that lazy Guwaru won't tell me, we'll have to figure it out on our own! We'll need a Yeti and a Pepe at Grade A or above.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get a Yeti or Pepe to Grade A

string.name: msg
string.value: Lazy forest spirits... You can never depend on them!

string.name: msg
string.value: You can depend on me!

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara! How do you feel about being possessed?

string.name: msg
string.value: Sure, I'll do anything for... will it mess up my hair?

string.name: msg
string.value: Only if one of the Yetis eats you, but it's a risk I'm willing to take. Grade A Yetis and Pepes seem to have a preternatural hunger for human flesh, and we'll need two.

string.name: msg
string.value: That was exhausting to watch you do.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now then, stay here while I take the results back to Jules.

string.name: msg
string.value: I swear, I will destroy your house if you follow me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Julesy-poo! I brought you the monsters!

string.name: msg
string.value: AND you survived? Today could be going better...

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, THANK you, it's just naturally this silky and perfect.

string.name: msg
string.value: She's not even listening, which is good, because I have some seriously messed up plans for her tomorrow.

string.name: name
string.value: Slimy Category

string.name: info
string.value: We'll need to roll up your shirt-sleeves and dive into... blech... Slimy creatures. Play with Slimes or Snails.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Slimes and Snails

string.name: msg
string.value: I know everything there is to know about Monster Grades now. Now that I think about it, that was the first week of Monster Doctor School.

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules, do you need me to try on outfits for you?

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara, I believe I heard a large chest of jewels fall out of the sky on your room!

string.name: msg
string.value: It might just have been a bunch of soda cans I threw.

string.name: msg
string.value: What? I'd better go see if I can see myself in them!

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah, I'll help out this idiot while you're gone.

string.name: msg
string.value: Talk about me while I'm gone!

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara rushes away.

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo, please help play with Slimes and Snails 20 times. If you start to feel a burning, that's just the slime dissolving your bones.

string.name: msg
string.value: I cannot tell you how many of those slimy things I ate.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, how come your face is slime-free?

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules, we have done your terrible chores.

string.name: msg
string.value: You two look like you had to touch more icky things than a--

string.name: msg
string.value: I am tired of you acting smarter than me!

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo, I only act smarter than you because I AM smarter than you. Now give me some of the slime on your face.

string.name: msg
string.value: You two had better get cleaned up before you start getting Slime Pox.

string.name: name
string.value: Guwaren't You Having Fun?

string.name: info
string.value: Some monsters are more special than others, which could lead to profits! Play with Special monsters 10 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Special Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm realizing how little money you have to give me. My research needs to turn up something, and my music career is just getting off the ground.

string.name: msg
string.value: I do not care about any of this.

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo takes off.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm glad he's gone. Now I can tell you my plan.

string.name: msg
string.value: But you can't tell anybody, okay?

string.name: msg
string.value: If you want me to trust you, you have to play with Special monsters 10 times. Show me you're not working for the man.

string.name: msg
string.value: All right, you're part of this now.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hours pass...

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm beginning to think that research is hard. What are all of these doohickies? Which one is a test tube?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, why would you turn down a visit to Dr. Jules?

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara! You didn't explode in a fireball. How... unexpected.

string.name: msg
string.value: Somebody threw sixteen cases of soda through my window. There were bees everywhere, but it was a nice gesture.

string.name: msg
string.value: HUMANS! I AM THE GREAT AND POWERFUL--

string.name: msg
string.value: Be quiet, Aya! I'm trying to figure out how to get the lady on this pen to-- oooh, you turn it upside down!

string.name: msg
string.value: IAMTHEGREATANDPOWERFULGUWARU! I came to answer your questions.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, hello! Why did you categorize all the weird monsters together? Was it for a stew recipe?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, geez... this again... I, uh, I think I left my oven...

string.name: msg
string.value: Why are you guys all staring at me?

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, why aren't you all staring at me?

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm guessing Guwaru didn't tell us the answer, because he is a spirit, and spirits don't understand how much money he just cost me. I'm going to my room...

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles wants some toys. Maybe the Toys would know where to get some? I bet if you played with them 10 times...

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Toys

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Where's hat-man? I haven't sniffed him today.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo's over there.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Holy poop, wing-lady answered me!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles. I'm a Fairy. I understand ever... Well, I HEAR everything you say. Not sure I understand it...

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Really? Really?)

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah, I'm amazing. Hey, Paolo! Kibbles wants you.

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, you're here!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Why don't you understand me, hat-man?)

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo, I told you I can understand Kibbles, right?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, you can too? Yeah, it's great. He's so well-spoken.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I wonder what your butt smells like today!)

string.name: msg
string.value: You might want to get Kibbles some toys, y'know. He has...strange hobbies.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (What are you talking about, wing-lady? Butt-sniffing is all I need in life.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hear that? Totally wants toys.

string.name: msg
string.value: ... (Kibbles glares at Aya.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, Kibbles! I'll get you some nice, clean toys. Like a BB gun! We can go shooting together.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, I need help! I can't remember where to get toys. Ask some Toys where to find some toys, okay?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woo, this looks great! I'd love to keep them for...um...selling online like a grown man, but... Kibbles, you can have this.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I just wanna smell butts...)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, he's happy! Look how happy he is!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (You disappoint me, hat-man.)

string.name: name
string.value: Aya's Helping! 1

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles is really into Devils right now! I guess he likes the incredible heat and scent of brimstone. Let's help him make Devil friends!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Devils

string.name: msg
string.value: Wow... Paolo does whatever Kibbles "says". Hee hee... I think he needs an interpreter.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (You seem kinda evil, wing-lady.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Evil? No, I'm just having fun! And we're going to have LOTS of FUN, Kibbles. Oh yes.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Fun? Will there be butts?)

string.name: msg
string.value: Um, sure! How about we hustle some cats?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Cats? I like cats! Let's chase cats and smell them!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hmmm... Maybe Cats aren't enough fun. Ooh, I know. I bet you want to play with DEMONS.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (No! No! Cats are fine! Cats are fine!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, Paolo? Where are you, Paolo!

string.name: msg
string.value: What? I was just about to go dolphin wrestling.

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles has a better idea! Let's go play with Devils!

string.name: msg
string.value: C'mon, you like Devils, right? I bet there are 10 out there looking for fun!

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, we went through four years of couples therapy to work out all this evil! Don't fall back now!

string.name: msg
string.value: Man, that was pretty fun! Good suggestion, Kibbles!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (They smelled like fire! My nose burns.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hahahaha! Yes, I will invite them to your Bar Mitzvah.

string.name: name
string.value: Desperate Kibbles

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (Let's talk to wing-ladies 6 times. I need a new wing-lady!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Fairies

string.name: msg
string.value: It's fun being the only one who understands Kibbles. I can do whatever I want with Paolo!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (You're selfish!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Geez, I just wanted to have some fun! Lay off!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya takes off.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Wing-lady isn't so nice. She even smells evil.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Maybe the other wing-ladies are nicer. I want to meet some!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Hello ladies!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Hey, hey!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (New wing-lady doesn't listen. Is evil wing-lady the only one who can? Sadness.)

string.name: name
string.value: Aya's Helping! 2

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles would LOVE a Wooden Slide, even though he hates climbing things. And sliding on things. He'll get over it.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy and place a Wooden Slide

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, how can you understand Kibbles? Teach me your fairy ways!

string.name: msg
string.value: It's because I'm the best fairy! And no, because in case you didn't notice, you're not a fairy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, shoot.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, Kibbles is talking again. What is it, boy?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I am?)

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles says he's still bored.

string.name: msg
string.value: What, really? Kibbles, are you still bored?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Am I? I don't think so...)

string.name: msg
string.value: Trust me, he's really suffering. In his heart, he's CRYING OUT for a Wooden Slide. He NEEDS it!

string.name: msg
string.value: It's like you can whisper and the dog will here! You must be a canine talkperson.

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, hurry it up! Kibbles can't wait for his Wooden Slide forever!

string.name: msg
string.value: ... (He stares at Paolo with pity.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, umm... Could you buy a Wooden Slide from the Shop? I spent my money on chocolate-covered pencils.

string.name: msg
string.value: Besides, I wanna try the slide out too! I bet it's a hundred feet tall and launches you into space!

string.name: msg
string.value: Kibbles, look at this slide! It's not a hundred feet tall, but it still looks pretty great!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woo, let's party!

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Humans like the strangest things. I'm going to find a dead fish to roll around on.)

string.name: name
string.value: Everyone's Business

string.name: info
string.value: Aya's going nuts and stealing the spotlight! We have to calm her down before everyone forgets about me. See if any of the Slimes or Snails know what to do. They're pretty boring monsters.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Slimes and Snails

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya's getting out of control. I can't deal with it anymore.

string.name: msg
string.value: I mean, look at all the attention she's getting! Who knew it was so easy?

string.name: msg
string.value: Slimes and Snails always look calm and boring. Maybe they know a way we can get Aya to simmer down.

string.name: msg
string.value: Check with 10 of them.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hi! Hello! What's happening?

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, we need to talk. About Slimes, and Snails, and chilling out.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aww, no way! I don't feel like it.

string.name: msg
string.value: Come on, be a good girl. Everyone's watching you, and that's not right.

string.name: name
string.value: I Can Make Things Worse

string.name: info
string.value: Are you sure about this? I dunno what might happen. You should spend some time with the Undead, I think. 5 times, please.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Undead

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you judging me? Mind your own business!

string.name: msg
string.value: That's not what we meant.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, it is. And you haven't seen anything yet!

string.name: msg
string.value: Actually, I think we've seen plenty.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh yeah? Oh yeah? Well... No! You haven't! You think I'm playing? Ask the Undead. THEY know me. I bet 5 of them could tell you allllllllllll kinds of stories. Hee hee.

string.name: msg
string.value: Mwa ha ha! Did they tell you of my wild adventures?

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Wait, of course they didn't. Undead don't talk.

string.name: msg
string.value: Sheesh, the Undead around here are useless.

string.name: name
string.value: The Absolute Worst

string.name: info
string.value: You want to know what I can do? Hang out with my Devil buddies! Get 20 together and you'll get the picture.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Devils

string.name: msg
string.value: I really need some eviler friends.

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Wait, my friends are plenty evil! Devils! They're the evilest. You know you're in trouble when Devils are around.

string.name: msg
string.value: If you can hang with 20 Devils, you MIGHT start to understand the terror that is Aya!

string.name: msg
string.value: Mwa ha ha! Behold the power of Devils!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...? You still don't look scared.

string.name: msg
string.value: I can't believe how nice these Devils are!

string.name: name
string.value: Winged Terror

string.name: info
string.value: All right, I'm bringin' out the big guns! My Dragon buddies ain't nothin' to mess with! See if you can survive meeting 30 of them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Dragons

string.name: msg
string.value: You people... You just don't understand how bad I am!

string.name: msg
string.value: I mean, I hang out with Dragons! DRAGONS! We go way back. Like, elementary school.

string.name: msg
string.value: Find my Dragon buddies! They'll set you straight. I bet you can't deal with 30 of them.

string.name: msg
string.value: That'll show ya! I'm gangs...

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, come on!

string.name: msg
string.value: Why are all the monsters so nice to you? Do you give them candy or something? Geez.

string.name: msg
string.value: (Aya stormed away in a huff.)

string.name: name
string.value: The Face Of Fear

string.name: info
string.value: We need to find the nastiest, scariest Undead monster in town. I want to scare the pants off Doctor Dumblebutt.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Undead

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, Paolo! I got a question.

string.name: msg
string.value: What do you want, Aya? I'm wise to your fairy ways.

string.name: msg
string.value: No, you really aren't. Besides, it's about Jules. He's so boring! He's always making the same face.

string.name: msg
string.value: You mean that smug, self-assured smile that drips with condescension and disdain?

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Yeah, whatever. Look, I want to see him scared. Don't you?

string.name: msg
string.value: Anything that takes him down a notch is good with me.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's the spirit! Now, we need to score something that'll spook his socks off.

string.name: msg
string.value: Undead monsters are the creepiest thing I can think of. Jules hasn't lived on the mean streets long enough to deal with them. We need to find the nastiest one, though. Try out at least 15 of them.

string.name: msg
string.value: Agh, this is disgusting. Good work! Let's leave it in front of his door and knock...

string.name: msg
string.value: (Aya props the thing up in front of Jules's door, knocks, and runs off.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hide, Paolo, hide!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hello? Did my package from the Weird Chemicals of the Month Club finally come? It's about...

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, my... This is exactly what I needed for that one experiment...

string.name: msg
string.value: (Jules calmly takes the thing inside.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Y'know, Jules might be scarier than anything we can throw at him.

string.name: name
string.value: Spooky Spirits

string.name: info
string.value: We can't give up yet! Ghosts might just do the trick. Check out 9 of them, and bring the spookiest spook back.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Ghosts & Goblins

string.name: msg
string.value: Okay, Jules is weird, but even weird people are scared of Ghosts & Goblins. Right? Right.

string.name: msg
string.value: Nurture Ghost monsters 9 times. We need their help.

string.name: msg
string.value: I don't know about this...

string.name: msg
string.value: What does Aya want now? I was working on my "9 out of 10 bones work better unbroken" paper...

string.name: msg
string.value: (Aya sends a Ghost after Jules.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh my!

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm sorry, I didn't see you there. Are you okay?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, you're a Ghost. Well then, I suppose you're as okay as you could be.

string.name: msg
string.value: Geez, even I'm about to pee myself here!

string.name: msg
string.value: What is WITH this guy?!

string.name: name
string.value: This Has To Be Spooky

string.name: info
string.value: Bring me 3 Devils! Grade A or above! I'm not giving up without a fight!

string.name: todo
string.value: Have 3 Grade A (or above) Devils

string.name: msg
string.value: He's making me look like a fool! How can a stuffy nerd be so calm?

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, no one can be calm around Devils! Bring me Devils! The nastier, the better.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe you should jump Jules yourself. You're pretty scary right now...

string.name: msg
string.value: This HAS to work! Look at these nasty things. Let's get Jules over here...

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, are you having fun without me?

string.name: name
string.value: The Doctor Is Out

string.name: info
string.value: Dr. Jules is out cold! Water! We need water! Build a Well! It's an emergency!

string.name: todo
string.value: Build a Woodsy Well

string.name: msg
string.value: (Clara forced Aya to explain her plot.)

string.name: msg
string.value: You two! What is WRONG with you?

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't you EVER try to harm Dr. Jules again! If you do, I'll... I'll...

string.name: msg
string.value: What happened?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, Dr. Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya called me. Is something wrong?

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, nothing! You know Aya, always doing silly, pointless...

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Er, Clara, something fell out of your basket.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, that. I made that doll to spook Paolo, but...

string.name: msg
string.value: Here, let me get that for y...

string.name: msg
string.value: (Jules freezes when he touches the doll.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules! Dr. Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Yeah, that's a pretty freaky doll. I almost fainted too. Poor Professor McIdiot.

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules is out cold! Water! We need water! Build a Well! It's an emergency!

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules! Dr. Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh... Did I faint? I was so frightened...

string.name: msg
string.value: I feel you, amn.

string.name: msg
string.value: It's Clara's fault.

string.name: msg
string.value: Dr. Jules, I'm so sorry!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, it's no problem.

string.name: name
string.value: The Scary Scholar

string.name: info
string.value: Monsters of all types fascinate me, especially the scary ones. I find fear to be the best medicine. Still, some people think toys and play are healthier. I suppose it's worth a try. Let's interview 30 Toy monsters.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Toys

string.name: msg
string.value: So, I don't get it. You were cool with bones, ghosts, and demons, but a nasty old doll knocks you out?

string.name: msg
string.value: Do you have a toy phobia? I don't, but my phobia of cheese puffs might be similar. All that dust...

string.name: msg
string.value: Heh, no, not at all. Honestly, I'm terribly frightened by everything except monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, so... If that doll were a monster, it wouldn't have scared you?

string.name: msg
string.value: Theoretically, yes. I've studied monsters so much, nothing about them can surprise me. Dolls, however... How do we REALLY know what they're thinking?

string.name: msg
string.value: Your passion for monsterology is impressive, Dr. Jules!

string.name: msg
string.value: Not to me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, now I'm in the mood for some monster study. How about we focus on Toy monsters? Perhaps I can gain some insight into the dark workings of that hideous doll.

string.name: msg
string.value: Play with Toy monsters on other farms 30 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: I gotta admit, he's really serious about monsters.

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah. It's almost...scary.

string.name: msg
string.value: You're so amazing, Dr. Jules!

string.name: name
string.value: Paolo Problems

string.name: info
string.value: Please take care of monsters for me. 20 times will suffice.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: I don't feel so good. Like that time I ate a bucket of fried chicken, and then found out it was hair clippings from a barbershop.

string.name: msg
string.value: Could you nurture the monsters for me today? I was supposed to do it 20 times.

string.name: msg
string.value: I think I'm having fever hallucinations.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you grow a beard, or is your face a mountain?

string.name: name
string.value: Missing: One Paolo

string.name: info
string.value: Usually I wouldn't care, but I can't find Paolo and we're supposed to do my mid-day scream therapy. Can you go to other farms and play with the monsters 20 times? Maybe one of them saw him.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters on Other Farms

string.name: msg
string.value: Where is Paolo? We had a scream-therapy appointment! If I don't find him, I'm going to scream.

string.name: msg
string.value: Of course, if I DO find him, I'm also going to scream, but it will be much more enjoyable for me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe he wandered onto another farm. Go check around with other peoples' monsters 20 times. One of them has to have seen him.

string.name: msg
string.value: Please hurry. I'm not going to last much longer! OH NO!! HERE IT COMES!! WAAAAAAAAA--

string.name: msg
string.value: AAAAAAHHH!!! Whew, that's better. Did you find what's-his-name?

string.name: msg
string.value: What? Why are you lookin' at me and my sweet new stick?

string.name: msg
string.value: What about him?

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya, where did you find that walking stick?

string.name: msg
string.value: Nowhere! It's mine. It's always been mine.

string.name: msg
string.value: That's Paolo's, you little pinchy-faced goblin! Where did you get it?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Relax, saddlebags! I'll show ya.

string.name: name
string.value: Oh no! Paolo!

string.name: info
string.value: I gotta get out of the sun before my skin boils. Build a Floral Gazebo on your farm.

string.name: todo
string.value: Build a Lookout Shed

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo! Why are you sleeping on the ground?

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh... Clara? Is this heaven? Where is the cotton candy machine?

string.name: msg
string.value: Heaven doesn't have cotton candy machines. It's just row after row of desperate photographer angels shouting 'Clara, over here! Clara!'.

string.name: msg
string.value: My tummy feels like it is trying to escape. Is it angry with me?

string.name: msg
string.value: Probably, what do you remember?

string.name: msg
string.value: I was just watching TV in my underwear, drinking that brown water that comes out under my sink, like I always do, when a show about vegetables came on. So, I ate some of that weird stuff you gave me--

string.name: msg
string.value: Yeah, some of that borack-olly, and then everything went crazy.

string.name: msg
string.value: Your body is so used to running on chemicals, that it's rejecting real food. We need to get you into the shade. We need a Floral Gazebo... and maybe a bottle of drain cleaner.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't talk about drain cleaner, you're making me hungry.

string.name: msg
string.value: This seems like a nice place to die. And by die, I mean sleep for like 12 hours.

string.name: msg
string.value: Paolo is out cold.

string.name: name
string.value: Sweet Dreams, Paolo

string.name: info
string.value: Paolo should be okay, but you'll need to take care of your monsters while he's out.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: What's the deal with Paolo?

string.name: msg
string.value: He never developed past the age of four. Wait, are you asking why he's asleep? His insides are staging a rebellion.

string.name: msg
string.value: Speaking of which, I don't want to work any more today. I was supposed to nurture the monsters 10 times, but I've used up all of my care for others.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to go post angry rants about myself and rebutt them.

string.name: msg
string.value: The monsters are all happy, but Paolo's still asleep.

string.name: info
string.value: We need some real spooky ghosts. Like, Grade A ghosts. Three of 'em.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get 3 Ghosts & Goblins to Grade A

string.name: msg
string.value: Stupid Paolo getting out of work. How come I can't just sleep on the job?

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's see how he likes waking up to GHOSTS!

string.name: msg
string.value: C'mon, you gotta help. He might pee his pants! It'll be hilarious!

string.name: msg
string.value: We need some real spooky ghosts. Like, Grade A ghosts. Three of 'em.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ohhh, he's waking up!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hello, terrifying spirit of the dead. I HAVE AWOKEN...

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait... is that a g-g-g-ghoooost?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Serves you right, sucker! Don't mess with the fairy! I'm gonna get so many hits on MapleTube.

string.name: name
string.value: Jules's Lost Book

string.name: info
string.value: It's possible I left my books inside one of my patients. Go play with monsters on other farms 20 times and see if any of them are acting funny.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules frantically rummages through his things.

string.name: msg
string.value: Where are they?!

string.name: msg
string.value: My collection of bawdy romance novels is missing! Now what am I supposed to do while I'm performing surgery? Perform surgery?!

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, wait, I DID drop a book last time I was operating. Maybe you could go play with monsters on other farms 20 times and see if any of them are acting funny.

string.name: msg
string.value: Any luck?

string.name: msg
string.value: Darnit, this is a pickle! I've searched this entire three foot area within arm's reach and I STILL can't find them...

string.name: name
string.value: Snitches Get Stitches 1

string.name: info
string.value: You want help from my fairy friends? Nurture Fairies 800 times! Divided by 100.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Fairies

string.name: msg
string.value: Heh... heh... heeeeeh....

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya is either up to something, or she has a concussion.

string.name: msg
string.value: I think I know who stole Four-Eye's books.

string.name: msg
string.value: You want this kinda info, you gotta pay up. BIG TIME.

string.name: msg
string.value: You gotta take care of my informant network. Nurture Fairies 8 times, and I'll tell you what I know.

string.name: msg
string.value: This can't end well...

string.name: msg
string.value: Good work. Heh heh heh!

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey... I think I got the short end of this deal!

string.name: name
string.value: Snitches Get Stitches 2

string.name: info
string.value: Buy me a Rockin' Wooden Horse from the Shop.

string.name: todo
string.value: Buy a Rockin' Wooden Horse

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, that last deal was terrible. You need to buy me something.

string.name: msg
string.value: I want one of those wooden horses. The fancy kind, with all the colors! You do that, I'll tell you who took Harry Poot-head's stupid lady novels.

string.name: msg
string.value: This is less fun than I was expecting. It just goes back and forth!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, whatever. I'll just set it on fire later. I guess I owe you a name, BUT...

string.name: name
string.value: The Bold and the Jealous

string.name: info
string.value: The culprit made a shady deal with a Bovine on another farm to cover up his tracks. Play with Bovines on other farms 10 times, and look for clues.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Bovines

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, whatever, it was obviously Paolo.

string.name: msg
string.value: How did I know? There are literally six people here and only ONE of them has a grudge against Jules.

string.name: msg
string.value: He's completely head-over-heels for the blond chick, so he took the books.

string.name: msg
string.value: Hello, friends! Are you speaking of things that friends do say?

string.name: msg
string.value: I saw you talking to other monsters! You've gotta be a thief, because I said so!

string.name: msg
string.value: I was networking! I am very serious about my career.

string.name: msg
string.value: Liar! You were feeding those dirty bodice-rippers to cows! You were using them, like fat, smelly paper shredders!

string.name: msg
string.value: These accusations are hurtful to my feelings.

string.name: msg
string.value: This sneak thinks he can get away with his crimes? I'm the only one who gets away with crimes around here! Go play with Bovines on other farms 10 times, until you find the one that ate those books.

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you going to look through their poops?

string.name: msg
string.value: What'd you find? Can we send him to the chair?

string.name: msg
string.value: I told you, I'm innocent. Why else would I be wearing this hat?

string.name: name
string.value: The Tale of Lord Captain Piratehands

string.name: info
string.value: These books are so dreamy. I want to see you combine a monster with a Yeti or Pepe.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with a Yeti or Pepe

string.name: msg
string.value: What are we all arguing about? Is it how beautiful I am?

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya called me a thief!

string.name: msg
string.value: (You explain that Paolo is the prime suspect of the missing books.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, you mean these?

string.name: msg
string.value: What just happened?

string.name: msg
string.value: All right, blondie! I didn't know you had it in you!

string.name: msg
string.value: What are you talking about? I just wanted to see what kinds of stories got Dr. Jules's heart throbbing.

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, now he thinks someone stole them. I bet he'll call the cops if you take them back.

string.name: msg
string.value: Oh, no, my handbag collection is made entirely of endangered forest nymphs! We have to get these back to him without him knowing.

string.name: msg
string.value: Why don't we just throw them at him from a moving car?

string.name: msg
string.value: No, I just got the chapter where Lord Captain Piratehands has taken the Good Lady Ladylady as his bride! I don't want to ruin the book.

string.name: msg
string.value: We just need to distract Jules with pointless work. Go combine a monster with a Yeti or a Pepe or something.

string.name: msg
string.value: All done. Can you believe Piratehands had normal hands after all? He's so brave.

string.name: info
string.value: I'm testing a new monster medication that should reduce the number of rage zombies I create by at least 12 percent. Combine your monsters with Grade S monster 3 times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine with Grade S Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Julesy... I have your books. I read them all.

string.name: msg
string.value: What? You did? What about those other pages that were tucked in the back?

string.name: msg
string.value: I read those too... the grammar was VERY adequate!

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, I KNEW I had what it takes to write those novels! Finally, I can quit this doctor gig and have a REAL job. Take that, mom!

string.name: msg
string.value: You wrote those pages? The parts where Admiral Julian fought off a billion lusty ladies were so thrilling!

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, you know what they say: write what you know.

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules can't write! Gimme that. I wanna see.

string.name: msg
string.value: Let's see...

string.name: msg
string.value: It's called 'Admiral Julian and the Seas of Trouble'?

string.name: msg
string.value: Yes, you see, in this book, Admiral Julian discovers that he is the son of dread pirate Trouble, who is also his uncle and sometimes his grandfather. It's a classic Oedipal tragi-dram-edy.

string.name: msg
string.value: That sounds terrible.

string.name: msg
string.value: They say the harshest critics are just fans who hate you. Help me with this experiment, and I'll tell you my whole plan for this 600 episode classic-in-the-making.

string.name: msg
string.value: Combine one of your monsters with a Grade S monster 3 times. It should take me about that long to tell Paolo the whole story.

string.name: msg
string.value: Jules, your vision for the Isles of Happy Pirate Guys is just breathtaking...

string.name: msg
string.value: It's true, I'm pretty much a writing genius.

string.name: msg
string.value: You should never be allowed to hold another pencil.

string.name: msg
string.value: Can we get back to pranking Paolo?

string.name: msg
string.value: What? When did you prank me?

string.name: name
string.value: Love Potion 1

string.name: info
string.value: I need some love potion ingredients... for reasons. Go play with Ghosts & Goblins and bring back some Ghost Essence.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Ghosts & Goblins

string.name: msg
string.value: I love watching Paolo fumble around when Clara comes by.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya's laugh sounds meaner than usual.

string.name: msg
string.value: What a sap. You know how I stay free? I keep my heart to myself!

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess it's KINDA cute how much he likes her. I don't know why he doesn't just slip a love potion into her dinner to get things rolling.

string.name: msg
string.value: SPEAKING OF WHICH, I just happen to have this Essence Collector and I just happen to know a love potion recipe that involves playing with Ghosts. Lucky you!

string.name: msg
string.value: You got it? Good, good, my plan is coming together! I need a few more things...

string.name: msg
string.value: Aye took the Ghost Essence and left.

string.name: name
string.value: Love Potion 2

string.name: info
string.value: Now we need some Reptile Tails, because they're gross, and love is gross. But they have to be level 5! And I need two of them!

string.name: todo
string.value: Get Reptiles to Level 5

string.name: msg
string.value: Uh, lemme see... I got this book on love potions on sale at a dollar store. It's probably good, right? It says we need two Level 5 Reptile Tails.

string.name: msg
string.value: Reptiles grow their tails back, right? I think I heard that somewhere.

string.name: msg
string.value: Ew, are they still wriggling?

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya took the tails and wandered off, muttering to herself.

string.name: name
string.value: Targetting Error

string.name: info
string.value: Clara likes cute toys. Get 1 Toy monster to Grade S.

string.name: todo
string.value: Get a Toy to Grade S

string.name: msg
string.value: The love potion's ready! The book said whoever smelled it would fall in love with the first person they met, but obviously that's wrong because you and me have ALWAYS been in love, right?

string.name: msg
string.value: I love you as much as Clara loves toys, but her tastes are super expensive. Like Grade S or above, only. Get one of those toys and pour this goop inside. Okay, sugarplum?

string.name: msg
string.value: That Toy keeps following me around. It's not that I don't like it, but...

string.name: msg
string.value: (You explain about the whole love potion thing.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Hahahaha! Who would need a potion to love ME?

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, maybe the lady that does my toenails. Call someone a 'festering peasant' one time...

string.name: msg
string.value: You know, as much as I like you trying to make more people love me, I don't think Aya has the best intentions. You shouldn't' help her anymore.

string.name: name
string.value: Cupid's Bow

string.name: info
string.value: This whole thing will only work if I can shoot people. Go play with plants 77 times to get enough wood for a bow.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Why did you ruin my scheme, honey-bunny? I guess I'll have to get all cliched and do this the fairy way: a good, old-fashioned Cupid's arrow.

string.name: msg
string.value: Obviously, I'm not allowed to buy a bow due to some prior indiscretions, so we're going to need to build one.

string.name: msg
string.value: It needs to be a good one too! I need 77 pieces of Wood from 77 Plants. You better get to playing, sugar-face.

string.name: msg
string.value: Did you bring a wheelbarrow? Yeesh, you're the worst sweetheart I've ever had.

string.name: msg
string.value: Aya managed to get all the Wood somehow.

string.name: name
string.value: Cupid's Arrow

string.name: info
string.value: I need a whole lotta Spirit Essence to make a decent Cupid's Arrow. Play with Spirits & Sentinels 77 times, and bring me their sweet, sweet Essence.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Spirits & Sentinels

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh, I feel terrible. Was I calling you sweetheart? That stupid potion actually works! You better not have gotten fresh with me.

string.name: msg
string.value: Now then... let's make something pointy to shoot with this awesome bow I made.

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm going to need to imbue the arrow with some spirits... I think. I sort of stopped reading at chapter 2. But I'm SURE I saw that I needed 77 of them.

string.name: msg
string.value: Mwahahahah! FINALLY, I get to shoot Clara!

string.name: msg
string.value: This is your lucky day, Paolo. You can call me the Problem Solver.

string.name: msg
string.value: Target sighted! And she's with Paolo!

string.name: msg
string.value: Ready, aaaaaaaiiiiimmmmmmm... FIYAAAAAH!

string.name: msg
string.value: Clara, your hair is beautiful like if the sun threw up!

string.name: msg
string.value: You notice Aya's arrow sticking out of Paolo's leg. It's bleeding pretty bad.

string.name: name
string.value: Busy Being Busy

string.name: info
string.value: Hey, can you take care of three monsters? You don't have to wait until they need you, just go ahead and stuff the help into their faces.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Your Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, you're pretty good at this! Maybe you can help me teach all of my sheep how to shave people.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (That was supposed to be our thing!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Haha! That's hilarious, Kibbles! I do not speak dog.

string.name: name
string.value: The Only Cure for Boredom

string.name: info
string.value: Most people don't know that monsters need constant approval from strangers to survive... sort of like me. Play with the monsters on other peoples' farms five times.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Those animals will live another day, but what will I do?

string.name: name
string.value: Knowing Things

string.name: info
string.value: Monster Combination is so interesting. At least, that's what all the blogs say. I don't even know what it is. Could you go to another farm and combine some monsters for me so I don't haver to read?

string.name: todo
string.value: Combine Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: I still don't really get it.

string.name: name
string.value: Mushroom Bed

string.name: info
string.value: Mushrooms would make perfect mattresses huh? Go and nurture one for me. I like to know the things I sleep on.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Mushroom

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm extremely allergic to mushrooms! Why did you let me do this?!

string.name: msg
string.value: You do it.

string.name: name
string.value: Pigging Out

string.name: info
