string.value: I love watching pigs eat humans! Humans are what I call potatoes. You should go feed some to a pig!

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Pig

string.name: msg
string.value: Look at their curly tails! I find them offensive.

string.name: name
string.value: Yeti and Pepe

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles told me he thought Yetis and Pepes were trying to steal our swagger and that CANNOT HAPPEN. I want you to go investigate them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Yeti or Pepe

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe I should buy a Yeti to ride... but then I'd have to let it eat Kibbles.

string.name: msg
string.value: (Paolo seems to be weighing his options.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Nah, who would I play video games with? We're cool, Kibs.

string.name: name
string.value: Artificially Excited

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles told me that you can make things and then those things will live. That's how monster movies start! You should check into these Oddities.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Oddities

string.name: msg
string.value: Are you part robot now? Were you infected by their artificial ways?

string.name: name
string.value: Creepy Crawlies

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles and I just got back from a Parisian face bath, where they put snails on your face and then slap you. It was not pleasant, and it made me think we should take better care of slimy things.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Slime or Snail

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you. Please don't come near me unless you wash your hands first.

string.name: name
string.value: Plant Friends Are the Worst Friends

string.name: info
string.value: You know what I do not like? Plants. Why do they just stare at me when I try to make them play ping pong?! I am trying to include you, plant! You need to go sort them out.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Why don't you just go photosynthesize something if you like them so much?!

string.name: msg
string.value: I just heard what I said. That was ridiculous. We're cool.

string.name: name
string.value: Rocky Start

string.name: info
string.value: Sometimes, when things get all crazy in my brain, I like to think about rocks. And then I think about moving rocks. And then I think about making rock armies to take over the world. Can you go feed my golems?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Golem

string.name: msg
string.value: I wish I were a rock sometimes.

string.name: name
string.value: The Softer Side of Dragons

string.name: info
string.value: Dragons are dangerous! At least, that's what the man wants you to think! I keep one of them in my house that I use as a chair. Speaking of which, I should go feed my chair. You should feed a chair too.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Dragon

string.name: msg
string.value: See how cool dragons are? Now imagine an entire soccer field of them! And then tell me where that is, because that's where I left mine.

string.name: name
string.value: I Love Cats

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (I love cats so much! I want to bark at them until they hit me on the nose! Go make yourself smell like a cat so we can play!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Cats, cats, cats, butts, cats.)

string.name: name
string.value: Canine Days

string.name: info
string.value: Kibbles is acting crazy. It's almost like he wants something, but he won't tell me. Use your words, Kibbles! Maybe him and his canine friends will talk to you instead.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Canids, Raccoons, & Ferrets

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (THE BALL IS MOVING FAST! I MUST HAVE IT!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Why is your tongue hanging out, Kibbles?! WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO HIM?!

string.name: msg
string.value: I'm joking! I know he only does that when he is feeling passionate about comic books.

string.name: name
string.value: The Flying Menace

string.name: info
string.value: I hate birds! They're always looking at me out of the corner of their eyes like they're better than me... and they are! They can fly! Will you talk to them for me?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Birds

string.name: msg
string.value: Am I the king of the birds yet?

string.name: name
string.value: Bovine Whisperer

string.name: info
string.value: I am concerned that my cow friends might be upset at me for purchasing that leather hot tub where I've been boiling my steaks. Can you go check in for me?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Bovine

string.name: msg
string.value: I applaud you for being a friend to cows! I'm gonna go eat a burger.

string.name: name
string.value: Reptilian Philosophy

string.name: info
string.value: My pet komodo dragon told me that the word reptile is just laser gun spelled backwards. Can you go find out if that is true?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Reptile

string.name: msg
string.value: While you were gone, I tried to use my komodo dragon as a laser gun and answered my own question.

string.name: msg
string.value: Can you drive me to the hospital?

string.name: name
string.value: Monkey Bear Showdown

string.name: info
string.value: Who do you think would win in a fight? A monkey or a bear? Go find out for me.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Monkeys & Bears

string.name: msg
string.value: Those monkeys threw banana peels at me! They fight dirty! Now I hate them! Bears forever!

string.name: name
string.value: Fairyly Excited

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (What are those things that fly around and sparkle and I WANT TO BITE ONE AND BE ITS FRIEND!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Fairy

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof! (What were we doing?!)

string.name: msg
string.value: Why is that dog staring at me?

string.name: name
string.value: Devils Aplenty

string.name: info
string.value: I wish I had a devil on my shoulder to help me even out the other voices in my head. Would you go see if one of them would be amicable to the idea?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture a Devil

string.name: msg
string.value: Did any of them say yes? I already bought an angel, but it's been starting fires at my house.

string.name: msg
string.value: Maybe I should just buy a turtle.

string.name: name
string.value: Fighting Fit

string.name: info
string.value: Where do Soldiers come from? Nobody knows, but I think we should try to befriend them in case they realize they know how to use swords.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Soldiers & Sailors

string.name: msg
string.value: There are still so many things we don't know about soldiers. What do they eat? Who protects them? What did they think of the newest Stirgeman movie? All completely unanswerable.

string.name: msg
string.value: You could probably just ask...

string.name: msg
string.value: As if a fairy would know anything about soldiers... hahaha!

string.name: name
string.value: Rubes In Toyland

string.name: info
string.value: Yeah, I'm too busy training Kibbles to maul people with glasses. How could I possibly play with these baby toys? You don't look busy. Maybe YOU want to play with them, right? Go on, play with your silly toys!

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Toys

string.name: msg
string.value: "Help me, Paolo! Jules is attacking me with science things!" "I'll save you, Clara..." Pew pew! Boom!

string.name: msg
string.value: ...Huh? AH! Um, ha ha ha! Hello! Boy, it sure is a great day to not play with toys and pretend they're your friends.

string.name: msg
string.value: I mean, manly guys like me don't bother with toys. I was just...um...saving them for you!

string.name: name
string.value: Monsters In The Wild

string.name: info
string.value: Some monsters live in packs. I wonder why? Do they owe each other money?

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Aliens & Humanoids

string.name: msg
string.value: Science tells us that owing one another money is the strongest bond two creatures can share.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret to Immortality

string.name: info
string.value: I've been thinking... If we could live forever, we wouldn't even need organs, right? I mean, those Undead monsters seem to be doing fine. Let's find out how they do it before I go through any more volunteers.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Undead

string.name: msg
string.value: Blast! I still can't figure out what keeps these creatures moving. I'll just have to keep experimenting. Where do you keep your dead bodies?

string.name: name
string.value: Down On Ghosts

string.name: info
string.value: I hate ghosts. Always whining about their eternal torment... They don't know how hard life on the streets is!

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Ghosts & Goblins

string.name: msg
string.value: Man, ghosts don't even CARRY wallets. Ghosts suck.

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Respect

string.name: info
string.value: I'm cool with Spirits. If you're down with their whole "Nature is Best" thing, they'll help you sneak money out of the registers at work.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Spirits & Sentinels

string.name: msg
string.value: Remember, the best friends are the ones that steal money for you!

string.name: name
string.value: Grunt Work

string.name: info
string.value: Grade C monsters are your workforce, because they are inherently inferior to all your other monsters. Do not pity them. It is their fate.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Grade C Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Good job. Remember, these monsters are beneath you. Keep them in line through fear and intimidation.

string.name: name
string.value: Making The Grade

string.name: info
string.value: Were you able to produce Grade B monsters? I feel bad for these monsters, because they occupy an awkward space between slave labor and respectable elites.

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Grade B Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Well done.

string.name: name
string.value: Farm Developments

string.name: info
string.value: The existence of Grade B+ monsters indicates that we can assemble better monsters from ones we don't like. I'll get the hacksaw!

string.name: todo
string.value: Nurture Grade B+ Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: Good work! A few more body parts from...volunteers, and we'll have Grade SS monsters in no time.

string.name: name
string.value: Bored Mushrooms

string.name: info
string.value: The air is thick with mushroom spores today. How desperate do you have to be to shoot bits of yourself into the air? Go have a talk with them.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Mushrooms

string.name: msg
string.value: I can't believe these mushrooms think they can use ME to carry their dirty spores around.

string.name: msg
string.value: I will help you obliterate all of them from the planet.

string.name: msg
string.value: Wait, maybe it means they love me. We should befriend them and use them to increase my popularity.

string.name: name
string.value: The Good Parts

string.name: info
string.value: I'm afraid the pigs are going to dig up the few nice parts of the farm. You need to distract them so they don't ruin what little work you've done.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Pigs

string.name: msg
string.value: Thank you. Now our farm won't look quite so terrible.

string.name: msg
string.value: Who cares? Food is food. People that eat out of trash cans aren't so picky.

string.name: msg
string.value: ...What are you even talking about?

string.name: name
string.value: Who Wants A Yeti Ride?

string.name: info
string.value: Pepe's a little punk, but he gets respect because he's on that Yeti. Hmmm...

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Yeti and Pepe

string.name: msg
string.value: Geez, you'd think it would be a smoother ride.

string.name: msg
string.value: All the more reason we need jetpacks around here.

string.name: name
string.value: Real Or Fake?

string.name: info
string.value: These artificial things creep me out. Mom said I should be nice to all creatures... But mom says a lot of dumb things.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Oddities

string.name: msg
string.value: Well...that wasn't completely terrible.

string.name: name
string.value: The Sticky Truth

string.name: info
string.value: You may think Slimes and Snails are relaxed creatures, but you would be WRONG. Their gooey exteriors hide hearts that burn with hate for vertebrates.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Slimes and Snails

string.name: msg
string.value: Trust me, if they could move faster or use tools, humanity would already be wiped out.

string.name: name
string.value: Play Fetch

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (I'm tired of peeing on plants. I want to play with them!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Plants

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Plants are boring. Back to the peeing!)

string.name: name
string.value: Golem Racer

string.name: info
string.value: I've figured out why Golems exist! It's so we can RIDE THEM! I mean, I can't think of another reason for huge stone figures to be given life. It's for our enjoyment!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Golems

string.name: msg
string.value: In hindsight, racing Golems was a terrible idea. Next time let's pick something that can run.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Heart

string.name: info
string.value: In the old days, the fearless were called dragon-hearted because dragons were so scary. But these days we give dragons sensitivity training, so they're much more agreeable.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Dragons

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey Paolo! I dare ya to stick your hand in that dragon's mouth!

string.name: msg
string.value: I already have a very large collection of antique dragon tongues.

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't you want to see that, Clara?

string.name: msg
string.value: Sure. Don't worry, Paolo. No one will care if you lost a limb.

string.name: name
string.value: Feline Tendencies

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (I want to like Cats, but they're always mean to me. Help me show them how nice I am!)

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Cats & Catlikes

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (They scratched my nose when I tried to sniff them! I should try sniffing harder.)

string.name: name
string.value: Canine Days

string.name: info
string.value: Canines need a lot of attention. I always listen to Kibbles when he tells me stories of his home planet. I wonder what his cousins have to say?

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Canids, Raccoons, & Ferrets

string.name: msg
string.value: Those canines were nuts! Why can't they be calm and intelligent like Kibbles?

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (I left a surprise in hat-man's shoes!)

string.name: msg
string.value: You're the best, Kibbles.

string.name: name
string.value: Bird Calls

string.name: info
string.value: I love birds. I got a nice cage to keep them in, but they won't listen to me when I tell them to get in! Maybe you can talk to them on their level.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Birds

string.name: msg
string.value: Ugh! How can the birds know how much I appreciate them if they won't let me keep them in a cage?

string.name: msg
string.value: You know what they say... "If you love something, don't mess with it."

string.name: name
string.value: Field Of Dreams

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (The moo-moos are so interesting. Many smells! I want lots of moo-moos to play with.)

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Bovines

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Moo-moos have strong smells, but are pretty boring. I tried to chase one, and it tipped over.)

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Hat-man does the same when I bite his butt. Strange.)

string.name: msg
string.value: ...What is it, Kibbles? Do I have something on my pants?

string.name: name
string.value: Lizard Run

string.name: info
string.value: The last time my car got impounded, I tried riding a lizard to work. Protip: Unless your boss doesn't mind you being 7 hours late, don't ride lizards to work.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Reptiles

string.name: msg
string.value: I guess I could ride the lizard to the impound lot...

string.name: msg
string.value: Hey, don't you have work today?

string.name: info
string.value: Woof, woof! (My fur is the furriest. I don't care what the hairy men and the growly bears say. I'll fight them.)

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Monkeys & Bears

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (They threw fish and poop at me! They must agree!)

string.name: name
string.value: Fairy Play

string.name: info
string.value: Everyone knows Fairies make the best friends. Sure, they may steal your wallet, or make you lose your hair, but you gotta take the good with the bad, right?

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Fairies

string.name: msg
string.value: See, wasn't that fun? And I'm sure they didn't take anything TOO valuable from you.

string.name: name
string.value: Devils Are Cool

string.name: info
string.value: Do you have any Devil friends? Everyone should have Devil friends. They drive me to parties and sneak me into movies.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Devils

string.name: msg
string.value: See? They're good people. Monsters. Things. Whatever, they're cool.

string.name: name
string.value: Veteran Visit

string.name: info
string.value: I like to spend time with the Soldiers & Sailors. They have insight on ways to hurt people that I never considered.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Soldiers & Sailors

string.name: msg
string.value: Interesting, are they not? And easy to get along with as long as you don't think about all the ways they can hurt you.

string.name: name
string.value: Collector's Edition

string.name: info
string.value: I just love pretty dolls and awesome toys! Well, I love to get them as gifts. I have the best collection, would you like to see? Find me some new toys and maybe I'll share.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Toys

string.name: msg
string.value: Hm? Oh, I've already seen all of those toys. Bo-ring.

string.name: name
string.value: Cultural Studies

string.name: info
string.value: Humanoids...those are all the people named "Hugh", right? I should study the culture and customs of these "Hugh's". Would you care to join me?

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Aliens & Humanoids

string.name: msg
string.value: I've learned many things today. For example, I learned I was shockingly wrong on why they're called Humanoids...

string.name: name
string.value: Kibbles's Instinct

string.name: info
string.value: I wanted to talk to some Undead, to learn about the other side, y'know? But I don't want Kibbles going after their...bones.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Undead

string.name: msg
string.value: Nice. Kibbles is clever, but he goes nuts for stuff like that.

string.name: msg
string.value: Woof, woof! (Why do you smell like old fish?)

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Priorities

string.name: info
string.value: Ghosts are scary. They don't pay attention to me! They just wail and moan about their past life. How could anything be so rude? It's shocking!

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Ghosts & Goblins

string.name: msg
string.value: Don't be scared, Clara! I'll fight those Ghosts for you!

string.name: msg
string.value: What? No! I just want their opinion on my new dress!

string.name: name
string.value: Un-Fairy Demands

string.name: info
string.value: Fairies get bored easily. Take me, for example. I'm bored right now. Why aren't you entertaining me?

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Fairies

string.name: msg
string.value: Well, it's a start. I'd rather go bowling.

string.name: name
string.value: Helpless as Babies

string.name: info
string.value: Grade C monsters are so cute! It's like they have no brains. I can just wave some flowers at them and they'll watch for hours.

string.name: todo
string.value: Play with Grade C Monsters

string.name: msg
string.value: There are so many cute monsters I should be wearing!

string.name: msg
string.value: What was it like to reunite with your old friend?

string.value: The Hippity Hops

string.value: Own a Desert Rabbit (F)

string.value: You've earned the 'The Hippity Hops' achievement!

string.value: Go for the 'Halloweeny' achievement next.

string.value: Go for the 'Benevolent Yeti' achievement next.

string.value: Benevolent Yeti

string.name: info
string.value: Own a Pharaoh Yeti

string.value: You've earned the 'Benevolent Yeti' achievement!

string.name: msg
string.value: Go for the 'Loveless' achievement next.

string.name: info
string.value: Own Pink Bean

string.name: msg
